title: 1.8 KVA Amizar  Inverter
shortDescription: 1.8 KVA Amizar pure sine wave inverter for reliable backup power in homes and small offices.
description: The 1.8 KVA Amizar Inverter delivers clean, stable power conversion from DC to AC, making it ideal for powering household appliances, lighting, and electronics during outages. With a 1.8 KVA capacity, it comfortably handles loads such as TVs, fans, phone chargers, and LED lighting. The pure sine wave output protects sensitive equipment from power surges and distortion. Built with overload protection and a compact design, this inverter pairs perfectly with 12V or 24V battery banks for dependable off-grid or backup power solutions.

title: 100w Emergency Solar Light
shortDescription: Portable 100W solar emergency light with rechargeable battery and automatic dusk-to-dawn operation.
description: Keep your home or business lit during unexpected power cuts with this 100W Emergency Solar Light. Equipped with a high-capacity rechargeable battery and an efficient solar charging panel, it provides hours of bright light on a single charge. The automatic sensor switches the light on at dusk and off at dawn, making it completely hands-free. Its weather-resistant housing withstands rain and dust, while the compact form factor allows easy mounting on walls, poles, or fences around your property.

title: 1200mm by 1800mm masive chandaria
shortDescription: Grand 1200mm x 1800mm crystal chandelier for large halls, hotels, and luxury interiors.
description: Make a bold statement with this massive 1200mm by 1800mm chandelier, designed for grand entrances, hotel lobbies, churches, and large living spaces. The generous dimensions ensure it fills high-ceiling rooms with elegance and sparkle. Featuring multiple tiers of crystal or glass elements, it creates stunning light reflections that transform any space into a luxurious setting. Built on a sturdy metal frame with a secure ceiling mount, this chandelier supports multiple bulb holders for brilliant, room-filling illumination.

title: 120W streetlight Solar Light
shortDescription: 120W all-in-one solar street light with dusk-to-dawn sensor for roads, estates, and public areas.
description: The 120W Solar Street Light is a complete, self-contained outdoor lighting solution that requires no grid connection or trenching. It combines a high-efficiency monocrystalline solar panel, a long-life lithium battery, and a 120W LED lamp in a single unit. The built-in light sensor automatically turns the light on at dusk and off at dawn, while the motion sensor can boost brightness when movement is detected. Ideal for illuminating streets, estate roads, school compounds, car parks, and rural pathways, it delivers reliable bright light every night with zero electricity bills.

title: 125A dc mcb
shortDescription: 125A DC miniature circuit breaker for high-current solar and battery system protection.
description: This 125A DC MCB provides overcurrent and short-circuit protection for high-capacity solar PV systems, battery banks, and DC distribution boards. Rated for DC voltages up to 250V or 1000V depending on pole configuration, it safely interrupts fault currents to protect your inverters, charge controllers, and wiring. The 125A rating makes it suitable for large solar arrays and commercial battery storage installations where high current flows are common. DIN-rail mountable for quick installation in standard enclosure boxes and distribution boards.

title: 12v led strip light
shortDescription: Flexible 12V DC LED strip light for accent lighting, signage, and decorative indoor or outdoor use.
description: This 12V LED Strip Light is a versatile, flexible lighting solution perfect for under-cabinet lighting, cove lighting, signage backlighting, and decorative accents. Running on safe 12V DC power, it can be powered directly from a solar battery system or a 12V power supply. The self-adhesive backing allows easy installation on flat surfaces, and the strip can be cut to length at marked intervals for a custom fit. Available in warm white, cool white, and RGB colour options, it delivers bright, even illumination with low power consumption and long-lasting LED performance.

title: 12v motor siren ms-290
shortDescription: 12V MS-290 motor siren for security alarms, industrial warnings, and emergency signalling.
description: The MS-290 Motor Siren is a powerful 12V DC-powered alarm device that produces a loud, distinctive wailing sound to alert people to emergencies, intrusions, or hazardous conditions. Operating on 12V makes it compatible with battery backup systems and solar setups, ensuring it works even during power outages. The compact metal housing is durable and weather-resistant, suitable for both indoor and outdoor installation. Commonly used for factory shift signals, security alarm systems, fire alerts, and general warning applications in homes, warehouses, and commercial premises.

title: 12w Motion Sensor Panel Surface Mounted 240vac
shortDescription: 12W surface-mounted LED panel light with built-in motion sensor, 240V AC operation.
description: This 12W Motion Sensor LED Panel Light combines energy-efficient illumination with smart motion detection in a single surface-mounted fixture. Running on standard 240V AC mains power, it automatically turns on when it detects movement and switches off after a set delay, saving electricity in corridors, stairwells, bathrooms, and storage rooms. The slim, round surface-mount design installs directly onto ceilings without any recessing, making it perfect for concrete soffits and rooms where false ceilings are not available. It produces bright, flicker-free white light with a long LED lifespan.

title: 12w led panel drives
shortDescription: 12W LED panel driver for powering recessed and surface-mounted LED panel lights.
description: This 12W LED Panel Driver is a constant-current power supply designed to safely power 12W LED panel lights. It converts 240V AC mains voltage to the low-voltage DC output required by LED panels, with built-in overload, short-circuit, and overvoltage protection. The compact, lightweight design fits easily above false ceilings or inside junction boxes. Use it as a direct replacement for a faulty panel driver or as a spare for maintenance. Compatible with most standard 12W round and square LED panels.

title: 12w recess panel
shortDescription: 12W recessed LED panel light for flush ceiling installation in offices, shops, and homes.
description: The 12W Recessed LED Panel delivers clean, uniform lighting from a sleek flush-mounted fixture that sits neatly inside false ceilings. Its slim profile and round design blend seamlessly into any interior, making it ideal for offices, retail shops, kitchens, and living rooms. The 12W output provides ample brightness while consuming minimal electricity compared to traditional fluorescent downlights. Easy to install with spring clips that hold it securely in the ceiling cutout, it produces flicker-free, eye-friendly light for comfortable working and living environments.

title: 150w Alltop Solar Sensor Light
shortDescription: 150W Alltop solar sensor light with motion detection for driveways, gates, and compound security.
description: The 150W Alltop Solar Sensor Light is a high-performance outdoor security light powered entirely by the sun. The integrated solar panel charges a long-life lithium battery during the day, and the built-in PIR motion sensor triggers the full 150W LED brightness when movement is detected at night. In standby mode, it operates at a lower brightness level to conserve energy while still providing ambient visibility. The Alltop brand is known for durable construction and reliable solar components, making this light perfect for securing gates, driveways, compound perimeters, and commercial property entrances without any electricity costs.

title: 15A sigle metalic socket
shortDescription: 15A single metallic socket outlet for heavy-duty appliances in industrial and domestic settings.
description: This 15A Single Metallic Socket is built for durability and higher-current applications. The brushed metal faceplate provides a robust, professional finish that resists scratches and wear, making it suitable for workshops, kitchens, and commercial environments where standard plastic sockets may not hold up. Rated at 15 amps, it safely handles heavier loads such as water heaters, electric cookers, and power tools. The socket mounts on a standard patress box and features secure screw terminals for safe, reliable wiring connections.

title: 16A 2p dc mcb
shortDescription: 16A double-pole DC miniature circuit breaker for solar PV and battery circuit protection.
description: The 16A 2-Pole DC MCB provides reliable overcurrent and short-circuit protection for small to medium solar installations. The double-pole design disconnects both positive and negative lines simultaneously, which is essential for safe DC circuit isolation. With a 16A current rating, it is well-suited for protecting individual solar panel strings, charge controllers, and small inverter inputs. DIN-rail mountable and compatible with standard enclosure boxes, it installs quickly into any solar distribution board for compliant, code-ready protection.

title: 18w recess led panel
shortDescription: 18W recessed LED panel light delivering bright, even illumination for offices and commercial spaces.
description: This 18W Recessed LED Panel Light offers high-output, energy-efficient ceiling lighting in a slim, flush-mount design. At 18 watts it provides significantly brighter illumination than smaller panels, making it the go-to choice for offices, conference rooms, hospital corridors, and retail spaces that need generous light coverage. The round panel installs into a standard ceiling cutout with spring retention clips, sitting flush for a clean, modern appearance. It delivers consistent, shadow-free light with excellent colour rendering, reducing eye strain during long working hours.

title: 18w surface panel
shortDescription: 18W surface-mounted LED panel light for ceilings without false ceiling cavities.
description: The 18W Surface-Mounted LED Panel Light is designed for rooms where recessing into the ceiling is not possible — such as concrete soffits, verandas, and older buildings. It mounts directly onto the ceiling surface with screws, and its slim, enclosed housing gives a neat, modern look. The 18W output provides bright, uniform white light across bedrooms, corridors, kitchens, and office spaces. Energy-efficient LED technology means lower electricity bills and a lifespan of up to 50,000 hours, far outlasting conventional fluorescent fixtures.

title: 2 Gang Way Switches
shortDescription: 2-gang light switch for controlling two separate lighting circuits from one wall plate.
description: The 2-Gang Way Switch allows you to control two independent lighting circuits from a single wall-mounted switch plate. Each rocker operates its own circuit, so you can turn on the living room light while leaving the hallway off, all from one convenient location. The clean white faceplate suits modern interiors, and the mechanism fits standard patress boxes for straightforward installation. Built with durable contacts rated for everyday residential and commercial use, this switch is a staple for any electrical wiring project.

title: 200Ah Solar Battery
shortDescription: 200Ah deep-cycle solar battery for reliable energy storage in off-grid and hybrid solar systems.
description: This 200Ah Solar Battery is purpose-built for deep-cycle applications in solar power systems. Unlike standard car batteries, it is designed to be regularly discharged and recharged, providing dependable energy storage for off-grid homes, backup power systems, and hybrid solar installations. The 200Ah capacity stores enough energy to power essential household loads — lighting, phone charging, TV, and fans — through the night or during extended cloudy periods. Maintenance-free sealed construction means no topping up with distilled water, and the robust terminals ensure secure cable connections for trouble-free operation.

title: 200ah luminous batter
shortDescription: 200Ah Luminous brand tubular battery designed for inverter and solar backup applications.
description: The 200Ah Luminous Battery is a premium tubular battery from the trusted Luminous brand, engineered specifically for inverter and solar power systems. Tubular plate technology delivers superior deep-cycle performance, longer backup times, and an extended service life compared to flat plate batteries. With a 200Ah capacity, it provides ample power storage for homes and small businesses running on solar or inverter backup. The Luminous brand is well-known for quality and after-sales support, making this battery a reliable choice for customers who need dependable energy storage with minimal maintenance.

title: 200w tronic floodlight
shortDescription: 200W Tronic LED floodlight for powerful outdoor illumination of compounds, sports fields, and work sites.
description: The 200W Tronic Floodlight delivers intense, wide-angle illumination for large outdoor areas. With 200 watts of LED power, it produces a massive light output that can cover entire compound perimeters, construction sites, sports courts, and car parks. The Tronic brand ensures quality LED chips with good colour rendering and consistent brightness over time. An IP65-rated die-cast aluminium housing protects against rain, dust, and harsh weather, while the adjustable mounting bracket lets you direct the beam exactly where it is needed. Energy-efficient LED technology keeps running costs low despite the high light output.

title: 20mm 2way Circular box
shortDescription: 20mm 2-way circular junction box for connecting two conduit runs at a junction point.
description: This 20mm 2-Way Circular Box is a standard PVC wiring accessory used to join two 20mm conduit runs at a straight-through or angled junction. It provides a neat, enclosed connection point where cables can be routed, pulled, or inspected within a conduit installation. The removable lid allows easy access for maintenance and cable pulling. Made from durable, flame-retardant PVC, it is suitable for surface-mounted domestic and commercial electrical installations. Accepts standard 20mm PVC conduit with push-fit or glued connections.

title: 20mm 3way Circular box
shortDescription: 20mm 3-way circular junction box for branching conduit runs in surface wiring installations.
description: The 20mm 3-Way Circular Box enables you to branch a conduit run into three directions from a single junction point. This is essential when routing cables from a main line to multiple circuits — for example, splitting a lighting feed to serve different rooms. Like the 2-way variant, it features a removable inspection lid and is made from tough, flame-retardant PVC that meets electrical installation standards. It accepts 20mm PVC conduit and is a core component in any neat, code-compliant surface wiring installation.

title: 20mm pvc bends
shortDescription: 20mm PVC conduit bends for routing electrical wiring around corners and obstacles.
description: These 20mm PVC Bends are used to change the direction of a 20mm conduit run when routing electrical cables around corners, beams, or obstacles on walls and ceilings. The smooth, pre-formed 90-degree curve ensures cables can be pulled through without snagging or damaging insulation. Made from rigid, flame-retardant PVC, they maintain the same strength and protection as straight conduit sections. Essential for any surface wiring installation in homes, offices, and commercial buildings where neat, protected cable routing is required.

title: 20mm pvc conduit 10ft
shortDescription: 10-foot length of 20mm rigid PVC conduit for protecting and routing electrical wiring.
description: This 10-foot (3-metre) length of 20mm PVC Conduit is the backbone of any surface-mounted electrical wiring installation. It provides mechanical protection for cables run along walls and ceilings, shielding them from physical damage, moisture, and UV exposure. The rigid PVC construction is lightweight, easy to cut, and flame-retardant. Standard 20mm diameter is the most common size for domestic and light commercial wiring, compatible with 20mm bends, circular boxes, saddle clips, and couplings. Stock up on these for full house wiring, renovations, or commercial fit-outs.

title: 25mm normal bends
shortDescription: 25mm PVC conduit bends for larger wiring installations requiring direction changes.
description: These 25mm PVC Bends are designed for use with 25mm rigid conduit, which is typically used in commercial and industrial wiring installations that carry more or thicker cables than standard 20mm conduit can accommodate. The pre-formed 90-degree bends allow smooth direction changes around corners without kinking or damaging the cables inside. Made from durable, flame-retardant PVC, they are suitable for both indoor and sheltered outdoor installations. A must-have accessory for electricians working on larger-scale wiring projects.

title: 25mm welding cable
shortDescription: 25mm² flexible rubber-insulated welding cable for arc welders and high-current connections.
description: This 25mm² Welding Cable is a heavy-duty, highly flexible conductor designed to carry the high currents demanded by electric arc welding machines. The fine-stranded copper core provides excellent flexibility, allowing the cable to be bent and routed without fatigue, while the thick rubber insulation resists heat, abrasion, and oil. Beyond welding, it is also used for battery interconnections in large solar battery banks, generator leads, and other high-current DC applications. Sold by the metre, so you can order the exact length you need.

title: 2T RATCHET CABLE PULLER
shortDescription: 2-ton ratchet cable puller for tensioning and pulling overhead power lines and guy wires.
description: The 2-Ton Ratchet Cable Puller is a heavy-duty hand tool used by electricians and line workers to tension, pull, and position overhead cables and guy wires. With a 2-ton pulling capacity, it handles standard power distribution lines and telecommunication cables with ease. The ratchet mechanism provides controlled, incremental pulling force, allowing precise tensioning without overloading the cable. Sturdy steel construction with a comfortable grip ensures durability in the field. An essential tool for power line installation, maintenance, and rural electrification projects.

title: 2T ratchet 360° turn
shortDescription: 2-ton ratchet puller with 360° swivel head for flexible cable and wire tensioning.
description: This 2-Ton Ratchet with 360° Turn features a full-rotation swivel head that allows the pulling point to rotate freely, eliminating cable twist and making it easier to work at awkward angles on overhead lines. The 2-ton capacity is sufficient for most distribution-level power cable pulling and guy wire tensioning tasks. The ratchet pawl mechanism ensures the load is held securely at every increment, and the release lever allows controlled slackening when tensioning is complete. Built from hardened steel for rugged field use, this is a step up in versatility over fixed-head pullers.

title: 2ft Waterproof  Led Light
shortDescription: 2-foot waterproof LED batten light for bathrooms, outdoor canopies, and damp environments.
description: This 2ft Waterproof LED Light is a sealed batten fixture designed for locations where moisture, dust, and water splashes are a concern. Its IP65-rated housing keeps out water jets and fine dust, making it ideal for bathrooms, kitchens, covered walkways, car washes, laundry rooms, and food processing areas. The compact 2-foot length fits neatly in smaller spaces while providing bright, even illumination. Pre-wired and ready to connect to 240V mains, it requires no separate tube or starter, significantly reducing maintenance compared to old fluorescent fittings.

title: 2m Recess Profile
shortDescription: 2-metre aluminium recess profile for embedding LED strip lights into ceilings and walls.
description: This 2m Recess Aluminium Profile is designed to be set into a routed channel in gypsum ceilings, plasterboard walls, or wooden surfaces, creating a sleek, flush-mounted housing for LED strip lights. The recessed installation hides the strip completely, leaving only a smooth line of light visible for a high-end architectural lighting effect. The aluminium body acts as a heat sink to extend LED strip lifespan, and the included frosted diffuser cover eliminates visible LED dots for uniform, glare-free illumination. Perfect for modern interiors, hospitality fit-outs, and retail display lighting.

title: 2p Andeli Double Pole
shortDescription: 2-pole Andeli MCB for simultaneous live and neutral circuit protection in AC installations.
description: The 2-Pole Andeli Double Pole MCB disconnects both the live and neutral conductors simultaneously when a fault is detected, providing complete isolation for critical circuits like water heaters, air conditioners, and cooker supplies. Andeli is a well-regarded brand for circuit protection devices, offering reliable tripping characteristics and durable contact mechanisms. DIN-rail mountable, it fits standard distribution boards and consumer units. Available in various current ratings, it meets the requirements for residential and commercial AC electrical installations where double-pole isolation is mandated by wiring regulations.

title: 2p ac spd
shortDescription: 2-pole AC surge protection device to shield electronics and appliances from voltage spikes.
description: This 2-Pole AC SPD (Surge Protection Device) guards your electrical installation against transient voltage spikes caused by lightning strikes, power grid switching, and load fluctuations. Installed in the distribution board on the AC mains supply, it diverts excess voltage safely to earth before it can reach sensitive appliances like TVs, computers, refrigerators, and inverters. The 2-pole design protects both live and neutral lines in single-phase installations. A visual indicator window shows the protection status at a glance, and DIN-rail mounting makes installation quick and tidy.

title: 2p mcb breaker
shortDescription: 2-pole AC miniature circuit breaker available in multiple current ratings for double-pole protection.
description: The 2-Pole MCB Breaker provides double-pole overcurrent and short-circuit protection for AC circuits, disconnecting both live and neutral simultaneously during a fault. Available in multiple current ratings to match your circuit requirements, it is ideal for protecting dedicated appliance circuits such as water heaters, cookers, and air conditioning units where full isolation is needed for safety. Its compact design fits standard DIN-rail distribution boards, and the toggle handle gives clear visual indication of the on/off state. A reliable, everyday circuit protection device for residential and commercial electrical boards.

title: 2p solar  spd 1000vdc
shortDescription: 2-pole 1000V DC surge protection device for safeguarding solar PV arrays against lightning surges.
description: Protect your solar investment with this 2-Pole 1000V DC SPD, specifically designed for photovoltaic systems. Solar panels on rooftops are highly exposed to lightning-induced surges, and a single strike can destroy expensive inverters, charge controllers, and panel junction boxes. This SPD clamps transient overvoltages on the DC side before they reach downstream equipment. Rated at 1000V DC, it is compatible with high-voltage string inverter configurations. DIN-rail mountable with clear status indication, it is an essential safety component in any professionally installed solar system.

title: 300w Solar Street  Light
shortDescription: 300W all-in-one solar street light for highways, commercial areas, and large-scale outdoor lighting.
description: The 300W Solar Street Light is a high-power, all-in-one outdoor lighting solution designed for wide roads, highways, commercial parking lots, and large public spaces. The powerful 300W LED array produces exceptional brightness that rivals grid-powered street lights, while the integrated solar panel and high-capacity lithium battery ensure it operates entirely off-grid. Automatic dusk-to-dawn operation with intelligent brightness control maximises battery life through the night. The rugged, weatherproof construction withstands heavy rain, strong winds, and extreme temperatures, making it a long-term, zero-electricity-cost lighting investment.

title: 32650 liFePo4 batteries
shortDescription: 32650 LiFePO4 rechargeable cells for DIY battery packs, solar storage, and electric vehicles.
description: These 32650 LiFePO4 (Lithium Iron Phosphate) battery cells offer exceptional cycle life, thermal stability, and safety for DIY battery pack builders and system integrators. LiFePO4 chemistry can endure 2,000+ charge-discharge cycles while maintaining over 80% capacity, far outlasting lead-acid and standard lithium-ion alternatives. The 3.2V nominal voltage per cell makes them easy to configure in series for 12V, 24V, or 48V battery packs used in solar energy storage, electric bicycles, UPS systems, and portable power stations. Their inherent resistance to thermal runaway makes them one of the safest lithium battery chemistries available.

title: 32A 1000v Disconect with mc4
shortDescription: 32A 1000V DC disconnect switch with MC4 connectors for quick, safe solar panel isolation.
description: This 32A 1000V DC Disconnect Switch comes pre-fitted with MC4 connectors, allowing you to install it directly inline with your solar panel cables without additional crimping or adapters. It provides a safe, code-compliant means of isolating the DC power from your solar array for maintenance, inspection, or emergency shutdown. The 32A/1000V rating suits most residential and small commercial PV string configurations. The rotary handle locks in the off position for added safety, and the IP66-rated enclosure protects the switch mechanism from rain and dust in rooftop or outdoor installations.

title: 32A 63A Solar PV DC Disconnect SWITCH
shortDescription: Solar PV DC disconnect switch available in 32A and 63A ratings for safe array isolation.
description: The Solar PV DC Disconnect Switch is a rotary isolator designed to safely disconnect solar panels from the rest of the electrical system. Available in 32A and 63A variants, it covers both small residential arrays and larger commercial rooftop installations. Rated for high DC voltages up to 1000V, it can handle the open-circuit voltage of long panel strings. The enclosed rotary mechanism provides visible on/off indication and can be padlocked in the off position for lockout/tagout safety procedures. Weather-resistant housing allows outdoor mounting near the solar array or combiner box.

title: 32A Chint double pole
shortDescription: 32A Chint double-pole MCB for reliable two-pole circuit protection in residential and commercial boards.
description: The 32A Chint Double Pole MCB is a trusted circuit protection device from the globally recognised Chint brand. It provides simultaneous disconnection of both live and neutral conductors at 32 amps, making it ideal for protecting dedicated circuits feeding water heaters, cooker connections, and high-power appliances. Chint MCBs are known for precise tripping characteristics, high breaking capacity, and long mechanical life. The compact DIN-rail mount design slots easily into standard distribution boards. Available in variable configurations to match specific installation requirements.

title: 3Phase spd 1000vdc
shortDescription: 3-phase 1000V DC surge protection device for large-scale solar PV installations.
description: This 3-Phase 1000V DC SPD provides comprehensive surge protection for three-phase solar PV systems and large DC distribution setups. It clamps lightning-induced transient voltages across all three DC conductors simultaneously, preventing catastrophic damage to string inverters, combiner boxes, and monitoring equipment. The 1000V DC rating makes it suitable for high-voltage solar string configurations common in commercial and industrial rooftop or ground-mount arrays. DIN-rail mountable with visual status indicators on each phase module, it ensures your entire solar installation remains protected from the unpredictable power surges that come with storm seasons.

title: 3W led recess  panel
shortDescription: Compact 3W recessed LED panel light for accent and task lighting in ceilings and cabinets.
description: The 3W Recessed LED Panel is a compact, low-power downlight that fits into small ceiling cutouts to provide focused accent or task lighting. At just 3 watts, it is perfect for hallway highlights, display cabinet illumination, bathroom mirrors, and stairwell markers where you need a point of light without high energy consumption. The slim profile sits nearly flush with the ceiling for a clean, modern look, and spring clips hold it securely in place. Despite its small size, it produces a bright, focused beam with excellent colour rendering for true-to-life colours.

title: 3m Alluminium Profiles
shortDescription: 3-metre aluminium channel profile for mounting and diffusing LED strip lights.
description: This 3m Aluminium Profile provides a professional housing for LED strip lights, turning a basic adhesive strip into a polished linear light fixture. The aluminium channel serves as both a mounting track and a heat sink that draws heat away from the LEDs to extend their lifespan. A snap-on frosted diffuser cover smooths out individual LED dots into a continuous line of light. End caps and mounting clips complete the installation. The 3-metre length is ideal for longer runs along shelves, counters, cove ceilings, and architectural features where seamless, uninterrupted lighting is desired.

title: 3phase 63A 4pole voltage protector
shortDescription: 63A 4-pole automatic voltage protector for three-phase equipment against over/under voltage.
description: The 3-Phase 63A 4-Pole Voltage Protector continuously monitors all three phases and neutral for dangerous over-voltage, under-voltage, phase imbalance, and phase loss conditions. When any parameter exceeds safe limits, it disconnects the load within milliseconds to prevent damage to expensive three-phase machinery such as motors, compressors, and industrial equipment. Once voltage returns to normal, it reconnects automatically after a configurable delay. The 63A rating handles substantial commercial and light industrial loads. DIN-rail mounted with an LED display showing real-time voltage readings for each phase, it provides both protection and monitoring in one device.

title: 3phase AVS
shortDescription: Three-phase automatic voltage switcher (AVS) to protect equipment from mains voltage fluctuations.
description: The 3-Phase AVS (Automatic Voltage Switcher) safeguards three-phase electrical installations from damaging voltage fluctuations that are common on unstable power grids. It monitors all three phases in real time and automatically disconnects the supply if the voltage rises too high or drops too low, reconnecting once conditions stabilise. This protects motors, refrigeration compressors, lifts, water pumps, and other three-phase equipment from burnout caused by sustained over-voltage or under-voltage. Compact DIN-rail design fits neatly in distribution boards alongside your MCBs and contactors.

title: 4 Pole DC MCB 250
shortDescription: 4-pole 250V DC miniature circuit breaker for high-current solar battery and inverter protection.
description: The 4-Pole DC MCB 250V provides comprehensive overcurrent protection for DC circuits in solar power systems with battery banks and inverters. The four-pole configuration allows protection of both positive and negative lines on dual battery strings or higher-voltage DC bus configurations. Rated at 250V DC, it is suitable for 48V and 96V battery systems commonly found in larger off-grid and hybrid solar installations. Available in multiple current ratings to match your system requirements. DIN-rail mountable for standard enclosure and distribution board installation, it ensures safe, code-compliant DC circuit protection.

title: 45Acoocker unit
shortDescription: 45A cooker control unit with switched socket for safe, dedicated electric cooker connections.
description: This 45A Cooker Unit provides a dedicated, high-current switching point for electric cookers, ovens, and hobs. The 45-amp double-pole switch completely isolates the cooker circuit for safe maintenance and cleaning, while the integrated 13A switched socket below offers a convenient power point for smaller kitchen appliances like kettles and toasters. A neon indicator light confirms when the cooker circuit is live. The unit mounts on a standard double patress box and is wired on its own dedicated circuit from the distribution board, as required by electrical installation regulations.

title: 4T Enershower
shortDescription: 4-temperature Enershower instant electric shower head for hot water without a geyser.
description: The 4T Enershower is an instant electric shower head that heats water on demand as it flows through, eliminating the need for a separate water heater or geyser. With four temperature settings — from cold to extra hot — you can dial in your preferred shower comfort regardless of the season. It connects directly to your cold water supply and a dedicated electrical circuit, making installation simple and affordable compared to traditional hot water systems. The compact shower head fits standard plumbing fittings and includes a built-in thermal safety cutoff to prevent overheating. Perfect for homes, rental units, and guest houses looking for an economical hot water solution.

title: 4ft floor trunking
shortDescription: 4-foot floor cable trunking for routing power and data cables across open floor areas.
description: This 4ft Floor Trunking provides a safe, organised pathway for routing electrical and data cables across floors in offices, showrooms, and commercial spaces where cables need to cross open areas without creating trip hazards. The low-profile design with a flat, rounded top allows foot traffic and even light trolley loads to pass over safely. The snap-on lid opens for easy cable access during installation and future additions. Made from durable PVC or metal depending on the variant, it protects cables from damage while keeping the workspace tidy and compliant with health and safety regulations.

title: 4p 100A ATS
shortDescription: 4-pole 100A automatic transfer switch for seamless changeover between mains and generator or solar.
description: The 4-Pole 100A ATS (Automatic Transfer Switch) provides seamless, hands-free switching between two power sources — typically mains electricity and a standby generator or solar inverter system. When the primary source fails, the ATS detects the outage and automatically transfers the load to the backup source within seconds, then switches back when mains power is restored. The 100A rating handles entire residential buildings, shops, and small commercial premises. The 4-pole design switches all three phases plus neutral, ensuring complete isolation and safe transfer. DIN-rail or panel-mountable for installation in main distribution boards.

title: 4pole 32A DC mcb
shortDescription: 4-pole 32A DC miniature circuit breaker for multi-string solar and battery system protection.
description: The 4-Pole 32A DC MCB offers robust overcurrent protection for DC circuits in solar PV and battery storage systems. With four poles, it can protect both positive and negative conductors of two separate DC circuits or a high-voltage DC bus, making it suitable for combiner boxes and battery distribution boards. The 32A rating handles individual panel strings and battery bank connections in residential and small commercial solar installations. DIN-rail mountable, available in variable configurations to match different voltage ratings and system setups. A dependable safety device that prevents wiring damage and fire from short circuits or overloads.

title: 4pole 63A motorized Ats
shortDescription: 4-pole 63A motorised automatic transfer switch for reliable three-phase power changeover.
description: This 4-Pole 63A Motorised ATS uses an electric motor-driven mechanism to switch between two power sources — mains and generator or solar inverter — automatically and reliably. The motorised design provides smoother, faster changeover compared to solenoid-based switches and handles higher switching cycles without contact wear. At 63A, it is sized for medium residential buildings, small offices, and retail premises running on three-phase power. The 4-pole configuration ensures all three phases and neutral are switched together for complete source isolation. Built-in voltage monitoring detects mains failure and restoration, triggering the transfer automatically.

title: 4pole ac spd
shortDescription: 4-pole AC surge protection device for three-phase installations against lightning and power surges.
description: The 4-Pole AC SPD provides surge protection across all three phases and neutral in a three-phase electrical installation. Lightning strikes, switching transients, and grid disturbances can send destructive voltage spikes through the mains supply, damaging expensive equipment like motors, PLCs, computer networks, and medical devices. This SPD diverts those surges safely to earth, keeping downstream equipment safe. Each pole module features a visual status indicator so you can confirm protection is active at a glance. DIN-rail mountable for clean installation in three-phase distribution boards alongside your MCBs and RCDs.

title: 550W Solar Panel  Voltage 499 vdc
shortDescription: 550W monocrystalline solar panel rated at 499V DC for high-efficiency commercial solar installations.
description: This 550W Solar Panel is a high-wattage monocrystalline module designed for maximum energy harvest per square metre, making it ideal for commercial rooftop installations, solar farms, and large residential systems. With an open-circuit voltage of approximately 499V DC, it is optimised for string inverter configurations that operate at higher voltages for improved system efficiency and reduced cable losses. The large-format cells and half-cut cell technology deliver excellent performance even in partial shading conditions. A robust anodised aluminium frame and tempered glass front withstand hail, wind, and decades of outdoor exposure, backed by industry-standard power output warranties.

title: 5w Garden Solar Lights
shortDescription: 5W solar-powered garden lights for pathway, lawn, and landscape decoration.
description: These 5W Solar Garden Lights add warm, inviting illumination to your outdoor spaces without any wiring or electricity costs. Each light features a small solar panel on top that charges the built-in rechargeable battery during the day and automatically switches on at dusk. The 5W LED provides a soft, pleasant glow that beautifully highlights garden paths, flower beds, driveways, and lawn edges. Waterproof construction ensures reliable operation through rain and harsh weather. Simply push the stake into the ground where you want light — no electrician needed. Ideal for creating ambiance in gardens, courtyards, and hospitality venues.

title: 5w solar garden lamps
shortDescription: 5W solar garden lamp with decorative design for outdoor landscaping and pathway lighting.
description: Brighten your garden with these elegant 5W Solar Garden Lamps, which combine decorative design with practical solar-powered lighting. The integrated solar cell harvests sunlight to charge the internal battery, providing several hours of automatic illumination each evening. The 5W LED output is bright enough to light pathways and highlight landscape features while maintaining a warm, relaxing atmosphere. Durable weatherproof materials resist UV fading, rust, and rain, ensuring the lamps look great and function reliably season after season. Easy ground-stake installation means you can rearrange your lighting layout whenever you like.

title: 5way Ht5 enclosure boxes
shortDescription: 5-way HT5 enclosure box for housing up to 5 DIN-rail mounted circuit breakers or devices.
description: The 5-Way HT5 Enclosure Box is a compact electrical enclosure designed to house up to five DIN-rail mounted devices such as MCBs, RCDs, surge protectors, and contactors. It provides a neat, protected environment for small distribution boards in apartments, individual circuits, and sub-distribution applications. The hinged or removable cover protects the devices from dust and accidental contact, while cable entry knockouts on the top and bottom allow flexible conduit and cable routing. Surface-mountable on walls, it is an essential component for organising and protecting circuit protection devices in any electrical installation.

title: 600mm by 600mm recess led panel
shortDescription: 600x600mm recessed LED panel for standard suspended ceiling grids in offices and commercial buildings.
description: This 600mm x 600mm Recessed LED Panel is a direct drop-in replacement for standard 2x2 foot suspended ceiling tiles, making it the go-to lighting solution for offices, hospitals, schools, banks, and retail spaces using T-grid ceiling systems. The edge-lit LED technology produces bright, uniform, flicker-free illumination across the entire panel surface, reducing eye strain and improving workplace comfort. Consuming significantly less power than the fluorescent troffers it replaces, it delivers substantial electricity savings over its long lifespan. Slim and lightweight, it installs quickly into the existing ceiling grid without any structural modifications.

title: 600mm by 600mm ssurface panel light
shortDescription: 600x600mm surface-mounted LED panel light for ceilings without a suspended grid system.
description: The 600mm x 600mm Surface-Mounted LED Panel Light delivers the same bright, even illumination as recessed panels but installs directly onto concrete or plastered ceilings using a surface-mount frame kit. This makes it perfect for offices, classrooms, and commercial spaces that do not have suspended ceiling grids. The large panel area produces generous, shadow-free light coverage, significantly outperforming individual tube lights or downlights. Energy-efficient LED technology dramatically reduces electricity consumption compared to fluorescent lighting, while the long service life of 50,000+ hours means fewer replacements and lower maintenance costs.

title: 630A 4pole Ats
shortDescription: 630A 4-pole automatic transfer switch for heavy-duty commercial and industrial power changeover.
description: The 630A 4-Pole ATS is a heavy-duty automatic transfer switch built for large commercial buildings, factories, hospitals, and data centres that cannot afford any interruption in power supply. With a 630A rating, it handles massive electrical loads across all three phases plus neutral, automatically switching between mains power and large standby generators when an outage occurs. The motorised switching mechanism ensures fast, reliable changeover with minimal arc damage to contacts. Built-in voltage and frequency monitoring means the switch only transfers to the backup source once it has stabilised. Designed for panel mounting in main switchboard enclosures.

title: 63A 2P SOLAR ATS
shortDescription: 63A 2-pole automatic transfer switch for single-phase solar-to-mains changeover.
description: The 63A 2-Pole Solar ATS automatically switches your single-phase load between solar inverter power and mains electricity. When your solar system produces enough power, the ATS keeps you running on solar. When solar output drops or the battery runs low, it seamlessly transfers the load back to mains — and vice versa when solar returns. The 63A capacity handles the full electrical load of most residential homes. Two-pole switching isolates both live and neutral for safety. DIN-rail mountable, with adjustable voltage thresholds and transfer delay settings to match your specific system configuration.

title: 63A 3p Chint mcb
shortDescription: 63A 3-pole Chint MCB for three-phase main circuit protection in commercial distribution boards.
description: The 63A 3-Pole Chint MCB is a high-quality three-phase circuit breaker from the globally trusted Chint brand. At 63 amps, it serves as a main incoming breaker in three-phase distribution boards for residential complexes, offices, and small industrial premises. The three-pole design protects all three phases simultaneously, tripping on overcurrent or short circuit in any phase. Chint’s proven thermal-magnetic trip mechanism provides reliable protection with long mechanical life. Compact DIN-rail mounting allows it to sit alongside other protection devices in standard enclosures and consumer units.

title: 6mm steel core wire rope
shortDescription: 6mm galvanised steel-core wire rope for guy wires, rigging, and overhead line support.
description: This 6mm Steel Core Wire Rope is a heavy-duty, galvanised cable used for guying utility poles, supporting overhead power lines, rigging solar panel mounting structures, and general lifting or tensioning applications. The steel core provides high tensile strength and resistance to stretching under load, while the galvanised coating protects against rust and corrosion in outdoor environments. The 6mm diameter offers a good balance between strength and flexibility, making it easy to handle and terminate with standard cable clamps, thimbles, and turnbuckles. Sold by the metre for custom-length requirements.

title: 6mtrs Telescopic hot stick
shortDescription: 6-metre telescopic insulated hot stick for safe live-line electrical work at height.
description: The 6-Metre Telescopic Hot Stick is an essential safety tool for electricians and line workers who need to operate switches, replace fuses, or handle equipment on live power lines from a safe distance. The telescopic design extends to 6 metres and collapses down for easy transport and storage. Made from fibreglass-reinforced insulating material, it provides high dielectric strength to protect the operator from electric shock when working on energised conductors. The universal fitting end accepts various tool attachments including prong disconnectors, tie sticks, and fuse pullers. A critical piece of PPE for utility crews and industrial electricians.

title: 6w led recess panel
shortDescription: 6W recessed LED panel light for general-purpose downlighting in ceilings.
description: This 6W Recessed LED Panel is a mid-size flush-mount downlight that strikes the perfect balance between brightness and energy efficiency for everyday rooms. At 6 watts, it provides comfortable illumination for bedrooms, living rooms, and small office spaces without the harsh glare of higher-wattage fixtures. The round panel installs into a standard ceiling cutout with spring clips, sitting flush for a clean, modern appearance. With an LED lifespan of up to 50,000 hours and very low heat output, it is a fit-and-forget lighting solution that pays for itself in energy savings.

title: 8"  Wooden Hoocked Climbers
shortDescription: 8-inch hooked wooden pole climbers for ascending treated timber utility poles.
description: These 8-inch Hooked Wooden Pole Climbers are designed for linemen who need to ascend creosote-treated timber utility poles for power line installation, maintenance, and repair. The 8-inch gaffs (spurs) penetrate the wood surface to provide a secure foothold, while the hooked design gives extra grip on the pole. Adjustable leather or nylon straps secure the climbers to the lineman’s boots and legs for a stable, comfortable fit during prolonged climbing. Made from hardened steel for durability and repeated use, they are a fundamental piece of equipment for any utility line crew working with wooden poles.

title: 800w solar digital meter
shortDescription: 800W solar digital meter for monitoring power generation, voltage, and current in PV systems.
description: The 800W Solar Digital Meter provides real-time monitoring of your solar panel output, displaying key parameters such as voltage, current, power (watts), and cumulative energy generated (kWh). With an 800W maximum measurement range, it is sized for small to medium residential solar systems. The clear digital LCD display makes it easy to check your system’s performance at a glance, helping you identify issues like shading, dirty panels, or wiring faults before they become costly problems. Compact and easy to wire inline on the DC side of your solar installation, it is a valuable diagnostic and monitoring tool for any solar system owner.

title: 8way 3phase distribution board
shortDescription: 8-way three-phase distribution board for organising circuit protection in commercial installations.
description: The 8-Way 3-Phase Distribution Board is a metal or thermoplastic enclosure that houses up to eight DIN-rail mounted circuit breakers across three phases. It is the central point for distributing power to individual circuits in offices, shops, workshops, and small industrial premises. The three-phase bus bar system ensures balanced load distribution, and the pre-punched knockouts allow neat cable entry from the top or bottom. Internal DIN rails accommodate MCBs, RCDs, contactors, and other modular devices. A lockable door or cover protects the internal components from dust and unauthorised access. Complete with neutral and earth terminal bars.

title: Adjustable Voltage Protector 63A Single Phase 2 Poles
shortDescription: 63A adjustable single-phase voltage protector with digital display for customisable over/under voltage protection.
description: The 63A Adjustable Voltage Protector monitors your single-phase mains supply and automatically disconnects the load when voltage rises above or drops below your preset thresholds. Unlike fixed-threshold protectors, this unit features adjustable upper and lower voltage limits, reconnection delay time, and display of real-time voltage and current on a built-in digital screen. At 63A, it protects an entire household or small business from the damage caused by power surges, brownouts, and voltage instability common on many power grids. The 2-pole design isolates both live and neutral. DIN-rail mountable for professional distribution board installation.

title: Armoured cable 2/3/4 Core 1.5/2.5mm
shortDescription: Steel wire armoured (SWA) cable in 2, 3, and 4-core variants with 1.5mm or 2.5mm conductors.
description: Steel Wire Armoured (SWA) Cable is the standard choice for underground power distribution, outdoor wiring, and installations where cables need mechanical protection without conduit. Available in 2-core, 3-core, and 4-core configurations with 1.5mm² or 2.5mm² copper conductors, it covers a wide range of applications from garden lighting circuits to sub-main feeds between buildings. The steel wire armouring layer provides excellent protection against crushing, impact, and rodent damage. PVC inner and outer sheaths ensure moisture resistance and electrical insulation. Suitable for direct burial, surface cleat mounting, or installation in cable trays. Sold by the metre.

title: Automatic Changeover Switch
shortDescription: Automatic changeover switch for seamless switching between mains and backup power sources.
description: The Automatic Changeover Switch detects mains power failure and automatically transfers your electrical load to a standby generator, solar inverter, or alternative power source. When mains power is restored, it switches the load back without any manual intervention. This ensures continuous power supply to critical loads with minimal interruption. Available in multiple current ratings and pole configurations to suit single-phase and three-phase installations, it is an essential component for homes, businesses, and institutions that rely on backup power systems. Features adjustable voltage sensing thresholds and reconnection delay timers for safe, reliable operation.

title: Bell Switch
shortDescription: Momentary bell push switch for activating doorbells and buzzers at entrances.
description: The Bell Switch is a spring-return momentary push button designed for activating electric doorbells, buzzers, and chimes. Press the button to ring the bell; release and the circuit opens again. The flush-mounted design fits standard patress boxes and matches common switch plate styles for a coordinated look with your other switches and sockets. Built with durable contacts rated for thousands of operations, it is suitable for residential front doors, office reception areas, and commercial entrances. Simple to wire with just two terminals, it works with both wired doorbells and low-voltage buzzer systems.

title: Car Jamper Kit
shortDescription: Portable car jump starter kit with built-in power bank for emergency vehicle battery boosting.
description: The Car Jumper Kit is a compact, portable jump starter that revives dead car batteries without needing another vehicle. The built-in high-discharge lithium battery delivers a powerful burst of current to crank your engine in seconds. Beyond jump starting, it doubles as a portable power bank with USB ports for charging phones, tablets, and other devices on the go. Many models also include an LED flashlight with SOS mode for roadside emergencies. Small enough to store in your glove compartment or boot, it is an essential piece of emergency equipment for every car owner, especially during cold mornings or after leaving lights on overnight.

title: Chicken Heat Bulb
shortDescription: Infrared heat lamp bulb for brooding chicks and keeping poultry warm in cold weather.
description: The Chicken Heat Bulb is an infrared heat lamp designed to provide consistent warmth for brooding chicks, ducklings, and other young poultry during their first weeks of life when they cannot regulate their own body temperature. The infrared radiation warms the birds directly rather than heating the air, making it efficient even in drafty poultry houses. The red-tinted glass reduces visible light to create a calmer environment that discourages pecking. It fits standard E27 lamp holders and is used with a brooder lamp reflector suspended at the correct height above the chick area. Also useful for keeping adult poultry warm in extremely cold conditions.

title: Concrete Pole Climber
shortDescription: Concrete pole climbing spurs for safely ascending reinforced concrete utility poles.
description: Concrete Pole Climbers are specialised climbing spurs designed for ascending concrete utility poles, which are the standard in many power distribution networks. Unlike wooden pole climbers, these feature hardened steel gaffs shaped and angled to grip the rough surface of concrete poles securely. Adjustable leg straps and shin pads provide a comfortable, stable fit during extended climbing sessions. Available in different gaff lengths and strap configurations to suit various pole diameters and personal preferences. Essential equipment for linemen, electricians, and telecommunications technicians who regularly work at height on concrete poles.

title: Crimping Tool 6mm-50mm
shortDescription: Hydraulic or ratchet crimping tool for crimping cable lugs and terminals from 6mm² to 50mm².
description: This Crimping Tool handles cable lugs and terminals ranging from 6mm² to 50mm², covering the most common conductor sizes used in residential, commercial, and solar electrical installations. The ratchet or hydraulic mechanism ensures consistent, high-pressure crimps that create secure, low-resistance connections — critical for safety and performance in high-current circuits. Interchangeable die sets match the hexagonal crimp profiles required for different lug sizes. The ergonomic handles reduce hand fatigue during repetitive crimping tasks. An indispensable tool for any electrician or solar installer who needs professional-quality cable terminations.

title: DP Switch
shortDescription: Double-pole (DP) isolating switch for safely disconnecting high-power appliances.
description: The DP Switch (Double-Pole Switch) provides complete isolation of both the live and neutral conductors for high-power appliances such as water heaters, immersion heaters, air conditioning units, and electric cookers. A neon indicator light shows when the circuit is live for added safety. Available in multiple current ratings to match your appliance requirements, it is typically mounted near the appliance it controls for quick access. The switch fits standard wall-mount patress boxes and features a robust rocker mechanism rated for thousands of switching cycles. A regulatory requirement for any dedicated appliance circuit that needs local isolation.

title: Digital Timer
shortDescription: Programmable digital timer switch for automated on/off control of lights, pumps, and appliances.
description: The Digital Timer is a programmable DIN-rail mounted switch that automatically turns electrical circuits on and off at times you set. Program multiple on/off events per day with minute-level precision, with options for daily, weekly, or custom schedules. Use it to automate outdoor lighting, water pumps, signage, heating systems, and any electrical load that runs on a predictable schedule. The digital LCD display shows the current time and programmed events, and a built-in battery backup retains your settings during power outages. Far more accurate and flexible than mechanical timers, it helps save electricity by ensuring equipment only runs when needed.

title: Double Pole (2p)20A,32A,63A 2p dc mcb
shortDescription: Double-pole DC MCB available in 20A, 32A, and 63A ratings for solar and battery circuit protection.
description: This Double-Pole DC MCB is available in 20A, 32A, and 63A current ratings, covering a wide range of DC circuit protection needs in solar PV and battery systems. The double-pole design disconnects both positive and negative conductors simultaneously, which is essential for safe DC circuit isolation since DC current does not have a natural zero-crossing point for arc extinguishing. Whether you are protecting individual panel strings, charge controller inputs, or battery bank connections, this MCB provides reliable overcurrent and short-circuit protection. DIN-rail mountable for installation in solar combiner boxes and DC distribution boards.

title: Double Pole d/p DC MCB 250
shortDescription: Double-pole 250V DC MCB for protecting 48V and 96V battery systems and DC distribution circuits.
description: The Double-Pole 250V DC MCB provides overcurrent and short-circuit protection for DC circuits operating at up to 250 volts. This makes it suitable for 48V and 96V battery bank systems, DC bus bars, and inverter input circuits commonly found in medium-sized off-grid and hybrid solar installations. The double-pole configuration ensures both the positive and negative conductors are interrupted simultaneously during a fault, providing complete circuit isolation. Available in multiple current ratings to precisely match your circuit requirements, it mounts on standard DIN rails in enclosure boxes and DC distribution boards.

title: Earthrod
shortDescription: Copper-bonded earth rod for establishing a reliable electrical earthing connection.
description: The Earth Rod is a copper-bonded steel rod driven into the ground to create a low-resistance path to earth for electrical fault currents. Proper earthing is a fundamental safety requirement in every electrical installation, protecting people from electric shock and equipment from damage caused by insulation faults and lightning strikes. The copper bonding resists corrosion in soil for a long service life, while the steel core provides the strength needed for driving into hard ground. Used together with earth clamps and earthing conductors, it connects your installation’s earth terminal to the mass of the earth. Essential for homes, commercial buildings, solar installations, and lightning protection systems.

title: Electrical Cable Twin earth 1.5/2.5/4.0/6.0mm
shortDescription: Twin and earth PVC cable in 1.5mm, 2.5mm, 4.0mm, and 6.0mm sizes for domestic and commercial wiring.
description: Twin and Earth Cable is the standard wiring cable used in domestic and commercial electrical installations throughout East Africa. It contains two insulated copper conductors (live and neutral) plus a bare earth conductor, all enclosed in a flat PVC outer sheath. Available in 1.5mm² for lighting circuits, 2.5mm² for socket ring mains, 4.0mm² for high-power appliances like cookers and showers, and 6.0mm² for sub-main feeds and heavy loads. The PVC insulation is flame-retardant and rated for indoor surface or concealed-in-conduit installation. Sold by the metre or in full rolls for complete wiring projects.

title: Flex Conduit
shortDescription: Flexible PVC or metal conduit for routing cables around curves and in hard-to-reach areas.
description: Flexible Conduit provides mechanical protection for electrical cables in situations where rigid conduit cannot be used — such as around corners, through moving joints, or in tight spaces behind machinery and equipment. Available in PVC (non-metallic) and galvanised metal variants, and in multiple diameters to suit different cable bundles. The corrugated or interlocking construction allows bending in any direction while maintaining cable protection. PVC flex conduit is lightweight and moisture-resistant, while metal flex conduit provides additional EMI shielding and fire resistance. Used in commercial fit-outs, factory wiring, HVAC connections, and any installation requiring adaptable cable routing.

title: Floatswitch
shortDescription: Float switch for automatic water pump control based on tank or sump water level.
description: The Float Switch is an automatic level-sensing device that turns a water pump on or off based on the water level in a tank, well, or sump pit. As the water rises, the buoyant float tilts upward and either makes or breaks an electrical circuit, triggering the pump to start or stop. This eliminates the need for manual pump control and prevents both tank overflow and dry-running pump damage. Easy to install by suspending it in the tank at the desired trigger level, it works with single-phase submersible and surface water pumps. A simple, reliable, and affordable automation solution for domestic water supply, irrigation, and borehole pump systems.

title: Floodlight 20W / 30W / 50W /150W
shortDescription: LED floodlight available in 20W, 30W, 50W, and 150W for versatile outdoor and security lighting.
description: This LED Floodlight range offers powerful, energy-efficient outdoor illumination in four wattage options to match any application. The 20W suits doorways and small gardens, 30W covers driveways and signage, 50W illuminates car parks and building facades, and 150W lights up sports courts, warehouses, and large commercial areas. Each floodlight features a die-cast aluminium body with IP65 waterproof rating for all-weather outdoor use. The adjustable mounting bracket allows precise beam direction, and the high-quality LED chips deliver bright, consistent white light with excellent colour rendering. Connect to 240V mains power for immediate, reliable illumination.

title: Garden Led Stand
shortDescription: Garden LED stand light for pathway and landscape illumination with a modern bollard design.
description: The Garden LED Stand is a sleek bollard-style outdoor light that adds both safety and style to garden pathways, driveways, patios, and landscape borders. Standing at a comfortable height, it casts a warm downward glow that lights the way without creating harsh glare. The weather-resistant construction withstands rain, sun, and dust exposure throughout the year. Powered by 240V mains, it connects to your outdoor lighting circuit for reliable, automatic operation with a timer or photocell. The modern design complements contemporary architecture and landscaping, making it a popular choice for residential estates, hotels, and commercial outdoor areas.

title: HA 8way solar Combiner box
shortDescription: 8-way solar PV combiner box for consolidating multiple panel strings into a single DC output.
description: The HA 8-Way Solar Combiner Box is a pre-wired enclosure that consolidates up to eight individual solar panel string inputs into one or two combined DC outputs feeding your inverter. Each string input is protected by its own DC fuse or MCB, allowing you to isolate and maintain individual strings without shutting down the entire array. The weatherproof IP65 enclosure protects the internal components from rain and dust in rooftop or ground-mount installations. Clearly labelled terminals and a DIN-rail layout make installation and troubleshooting straightforward. An essential component for any multi-string solar PV system to ensure safe, organised DC cabling.

title: HT12 Way Enclosure Box
shortDescription: 12-way enclosure box for housing MCBs, RCDs, and other DIN-rail protection devices.
description: The HT12 Way Enclosure Box accommodates up to twelve DIN-rail mounted devices, making it suitable for medium-size distribution boards in residential homes, apartments, and small commercial premises. It provides a protected, organised housing for MCBs, RCDs, surge protectors, contactors, and timers. The hinged or snap-on door prevents accidental contact with live components and keeps dust out. Multiple cable entry knockouts on the top and bottom allow flexible cable routing from different directions. Surface-mount installation with included screws and plugs. Neutral and earth terminal bars are included or available as accessories.

title: HT18way solar enclosure box
shortDescription: 18-way enclosure box for solar DC and AC distribution with space for comprehensive protection devices.
description: The HT18 Way Solar Enclosure Box provides ample space for up to eighteen DIN-rail modules, making it ideal for larger solar installations that require separate DC and AC protection devices, monitoring equipment, and switching components. It comfortably houses DC MCBs, DC surge protectors, DC disconnect switches, AC MCBs, AC SPDs, energy meters, and ATS modules in a single well-organised enclosure. The generous capacity eliminates the need for multiple smaller boxes, creating a cleaner, more professional installation. Weather-resistant construction with sealed cable entries suits both indoor plant rooms and sheltered outdoor mounting locations.

title: HT8 way enclosure box
shortDescription: 8-way DIN-rail enclosure box for small distribution boards and sub-panels.
description: The HT8 Way Enclosure Box houses up to eight DIN-rail mounted protection devices, fitting perfectly in small apartments, individual floors, or dedicated sub-circuits that need their own distribution point. Compact and wall-mountable, it provides a tidy, protected enclosure for MCBs, RCDs, and surge protectors without taking up excessive wall space. The snap-fit or hinged cover protects internal components and prevents accidental contact with live parts. Cable entry knockouts allow neat cable management, and the included DIN rail accommodates standard-width modular devices. A versatile, cost-effective solution for basic circuit distribution needs.

title: Half Body Safety Belt
shortDescription: Half-body safety belt harness for fall protection during pole climbing and work at height.
description: The Half Body Safety Belt is a waist-and-leg harness designed for linemen, electricians, and technicians who work at height on utility poles, towers, and elevated structures. It secures around the waist and thighs, with a D-ring attachment point for connecting to a safety lanyard or positioning strap. Unlike a full-body harness, the half-body design offers greater freedom of movement while still providing reliable fall arrest protection for work within a limited height range. Adjustable buckle straps fit a range of body sizes, and padded waist sections improve comfort during extended use. A mandatory piece of PPE for anyone performing elevated electrical work.

title: Led Adjustable Gypsum Light
shortDescription: Adjustable LED spotlight designed for flush installation in gypsum board ceilings.
description: The LED Adjustable Gypsum Light is a recessed spotlight that integrates seamlessly into gypsum plasterboard ceilings for a clean, architectural lighting scheme. The adjustable gimbal mechanism allows you to tilt and rotate the light beam to highlight specific areas, artwork, displays, or architectural features. Once installed, only the trimless light aperture is visible, creating a minimalist, high-end ceiling appearance. The LED module provides focused, bright illumination with excellent colour rendering, while consuming far less power than traditional halogen spotlights it replaces. Ideal for modern living rooms, showrooms, restaurants, and hotel interiors.

title: Led Bulb Head
shortDescription: LED bulb head lamp holder available in different fitting types for ceiling and wall fixtures.
description: The LED Bulb Head is a lamp holder fitting designed to mount LED bulbs onto ceiling roses, wall brackets, and pendant cords. Available in different base types (E27, E14, B22) to match your bulb and fixture requirements, it provides a secure mechanical and electrical connection between the bulb and the wiring. The heat-resistant body ensures safe long-term operation even with higher-wattage bulbs. Simple screw-terminal wiring makes installation quick for any electrician. Use it as a replacement for a broken or outdated lamp holder, or in new installations where you need a basic, reliable bulb mounting point.

title: Led Bulbs
shortDescription: Energy-efficient LED bulbs available in various wattages and fittings for general lighting.
description: LED Bulbs are the modern replacement for traditional incandescent and CFL bulbs, delivering the same brightness at a fraction of the energy consumption. Available in various wattages (from 3W to 24W and above), colour temperatures (warm white, cool white, daylight), and base types (E27, E14, B22), they cover every general lighting need from bedrooms and living rooms to offices and retail spaces. Instant on with no warm-up time, flicker-free operation, and a lifespan of up to 25,000 hours make them the most practical and economical lighting choice. Each bulb pays for itself in electricity savings within months of installation.

title: Led Pendants
shortDescription: Decorative LED pendant light fixtures for dining areas, counters, and stylish interior spaces.
description: LED Pendant Lights are suspended ceiling fixtures that combine functional illumination with decorative style. Hanging from an adjustable cord or chain, they create focused pools of light over dining tables, kitchen islands, bar counters, and reception desks while adding visual interest to the room. The integrated LED light source provides warm, inviting illumination with excellent energy efficiency and a long lifespan, eliminating the need for frequent bulb changes. Available in various modern designs to complement different interior themes, from minimalist industrial to sleek contemporary. Easy to install on standard ceiling roses or canopies.

title: Lightening arrestor
shortDescription: Lightning arrestor for protecting electrical installations and equipment from direct and indirect lightning strikes.
description: The Lightning Arrestor is a critical protection device installed at the point of entry to an electrical installation to intercept and divert lightning-induced voltage surges safely to earth before they can damage internal wiring, appliances, and sensitive electronics. Available in different current and voltage ratings to suit residential, commercial, and industrial applications, it works in conjunction with proper earthing systems to provide comprehensive lightning protection. Especially important for buildings in lightning-prone areas and for solar installations where rooftop panels are highly exposed. DIN-rail mountable for clean integration into main distribution boards.

title: MC4 Connectors 2x1 / 3x1 / 4x1
shortDescription: MC4 branch connectors in 2-to-1, 3-to-1, and 4-to-1 configurations for parallel solar panel wiring.
description: MC4 Branch Connectors allow you to connect multiple solar panel strings in parallel by merging two, three, or four MC4 cable outputs into a single MC4 output. The 2x1 combines two strings, the 3x1 combines three, and the 4x1 combines four. This eliminates the need for a combiner box in smaller installations and simplifies cable management on rooftops and ground-mount arrays. Each connector features IP67 waterproof-rated MC4 locking mechanism for secure, weatherproof connections that withstand years of outdoor exposure. Compatible with standard MC4 solar cables and panel connectors. Essential for any solar installation with multiple parallel-connected panel strings.

title: Metalic Cooker Unit
shortDescription: Metallic finish 45A cooker control unit with neon indicator and 13A switched socket.
description: This Metallic Cooker Unit features a brushed metal faceplate that gives a premium, durable finish matching other metallic switches and sockets in a coordinated range. The 45A double-pole switch provides safe isolation of the electric cooker circuit, with a red neon indicator confirming when the circuit is live. The integrated 13A switched socket below offers a handy power point for small kitchen appliances. The metallic construction is scratch-resistant and withstands the heat and grease common in kitchen environments better than standard plastic alternatives. Mounts on a double patress box and wires to a dedicated 6mm² circuit from the distribution board.

title: Metallic Switch 1 gang / 2 gang / 3 gang / 4 gang
shortDescription: Metallic light switches available in 1, 2, 3, and 4 gang configurations for a premium wall finish.
description: These Metallic Switches feature a brushed or polished metal faceplate that adds a touch of elegance and durability to any room. Available in 1-gang, 2-gang, 3-gang, and 4-gang configurations to control one through four lighting circuits from a single wall plate, they suit everything from simple bedrooms to complex living areas with multiple light zones. The metal construction resists scratches, discolouration, and daily wear far better than plastic switches, making them ideal for high-traffic areas and premium interiors. Standard rocker mechanisms with secure screw terminals for reliable, long-lasting operation. Compatible with standard patress boxes.

title: Mid Clamp
shortDescription: Aluminium mid clamp for securing solar panels to mounting rails at the panel mid-point.
description: The Mid Clamp is an aluminium mounting accessory used to secure the middle edges of adjacent solar panels to the mounting rail. Positioned between two panels, a single mid clamp holds down one edge of each panel, creating a strong, wind-resistant bond to the racking structure. The anodised aluminium construction resists corrosion and UV degradation for decades of outdoor use. Quick to install with a single bolt, it speeds up array installation significantly. Available in heights matching common panel frame thicknesses (30mm, 35mm, 40mm). A simple but essential component — you will need several dozen for a typical rooftop solar installation.

title: Neon snakelight
shortDescription: Flexible neon LED snake light for vibrant decorative and signage lighting effects.
description: The Neon Snake Light is a flexible LED tube that mimics the classic look of glass neon signs but with modern, energy-efficient LED technology. Its bendable silicone body can be shaped into letters, patterns, and curves to create eye-catching signage, decorative accents, and ambient lighting for shops, bars, restaurants, bedrooms, and event spaces. Unlike traditional neon, it runs cool to the touch, is shatter-proof, and consumes significantly less power. The uniform light output along the entire length produces a smooth, continuous glow without visible LED dots. Easy to mount with clips or adhesive backing for quick installation on walls, ceilings, and custom frames.

title: Oil Room Heater
shortDescription: Oil-filled electric radiator heater for safe, quiet, and efficient room warming.
description: The Oil Room Heater is an oil-filled electric radiator that provides gentle, even warmth through convection and radiant heat. The sealed oil columns heat up when the electric element is powered on and continue radiating warmth even after the heater switches off, providing efficient, residual heating. With no exposed elements or fans, it operates silently and does not dry out the air or blow dust — making it ideal for bedrooms, offices, and spaces where air quality and quiet operation matter. The built-in thermostat maintains your desired temperature automatically, and the portable design with castors allows easy movement between rooms. Overheating protection and tip-over safety switches provide peace of mind.

title: PV Cable
shortDescription: UV-resistant solar PV cable in various sizes for connecting solar panels to inverters and combiner boxes.
description: Solar PV Cable is a specialised single-core cable designed for the DC wiring of photovoltaic systems. Its double-insulated construction with UV-resistant, weather-proof outer sheathing ensures it withstands decades of rooftop sun exposure, rain, and temperature extremes. The tinned copper conductor provides excellent corrosion resistance and low-resistance connections. Available in multiple cross-sectional sizes to handle different current loads and cable run lengths, from individual panel connections to main DC trunk cables. Compatible with MC4 connectors for quick, secure, tool-free connections. Certified for DC voltages up to 1000V or 1500V depending on the specification. Sold by the metre.

title: Patress
shortDescription: PVC patress boxes in single and double sizes for mounting switches and sockets on walls.
description: Patress Boxes (also called back boxes or pattress boxes) are the mounting enclosures behind switches, sockets, and other wiring accessories. They are surface-mounted onto the wall and provide a neat cavity for terminating cables and securing the faceplate. Available in single-gang and double-gang sizes, with different depths to accommodate the wiring space needed. Made from durable, flame-retardant PVC, they feature cable entry knockouts that can be broken out as needed. A fundamental component of every surface-wired electrical installation — you will need one behind every switch, socket, and cooker unit in the building.

title: Photocell
shortDescription: Photocell light sensor for automatic dusk-to-dawn switching of outdoor lighting.
description: The Photocell is a light-sensitive switching device that automatically turns outdoor lights on at dusk and off at dawn, eliminating the need for manual switching or timers that require seasonal adjustment. It detects ambient light levels and switches a connected lighting circuit when the light drops below or rises above a set threshold. Easy to install on a wall, pole, or lighting fixture near the area it monitors, it connects in series with the lighting circuit. Use it to control compound lights, parking lot lights, signage illumination, and security lighting. A simple, maintenance-free automation device that ensures your lights are always on when needed and off when they are not.

title: Prepaid Energy Token Meters
shortDescription: Prepaid energy token meter for pay-as-you-go electricity metering in rental and commercial properties.
