description: The Prepaid Energy Token Meter enables a pay-as-you-go electricity model where tenants or consumers purchase energy tokens (via phone, MPESA, or a vendor) and load them onto the meter to access a pre-purchased amount of kilowatt-hours. When the credit runs out, the supply disconnects until a new token is entered. This eliminates monthly billing disputes, ensures revenue collection for landlords and utility operators, and encourages energy conservation. The meter displays real-time consumption, remaining credit, and total usage. Ideal for rental apartments, hostels, market stalls, and any multi-tenant property where individual electricity billing is needed.

title: Pv Fuse
shortDescription: DC-rated PV fuse for overcurrent protection of individual solar panel strings.
description: PV Fuses are DC-rated protective devices designed to interrupt overcurrent faults in solar photovoltaic circuits. Each fuse protects an individual panel string from reverse current flow and short circuits that could damage panels and wiring. Rated for high DC voltages (typically 1000V or 1500V), they are designed to safely interrupt DC arcs that standard AC fuses cannot handle. Available in multiple current ratings to match different panel string configurations, they install into compatible PV fuse holders mounted in combiner boxes. A simple, passive protection device that requires no power to operate — it just works when you need it most.

title: Recess Alluminium Profile
shortDescription: Recessed aluminium LED strip profile for flush-mount architectural lighting in ceilings and walls.
description: The Recessed Aluminium Profile is designed to be embedded into a routed channel in gypsum board, plaster, or timber surfaces, creating an elegant flush-mount housing for LED strip lights. The aluminium body dissipates heat from the LED strip to prolong its life, while the included opal diffuser produces a smooth, dot-free line of light. Available in multiple lengths and cross-section profiles to suit different installation depths and strip widths. Ideal for architectural cove lighting, under-cabinet illumination, staircase markers, and display shelving where a seamless, built-in lighting effect is desired. End caps and mounting hardware included.

title: Room Heater
shortDescription: Electric room heater for quick, portable warmth in bedrooms, offices, and living spaces.
description: This Electric Room Heater provides instant warmth wherever you need it. The compact, portable design allows you to move it between rooms and plug it into any standard wall socket. The adjustable thermostat lets you set your comfort level, and the heater cycles on and off to maintain it. Built-in safety features include overheat protection and a tip-over switch that automatically cuts power if the unit is knocked over. Ideal for cold mornings, chilly offices, and bedrooms in regions where evenings and nights get cold. A cost-effective way to heat the room you are in rather than running a whole-house heating system.

title: Room Heater With Fun
shortDescription: Electric room heater with built-in fan for accelerated heat distribution across the room.
description: This Room Heater with Fan combines a heating element with an integrated fan that blows warm air across the room for faster, more even heat distribution than convection-only heaters. The fan-assisted design warms up a space noticeably quicker, making it perfect for living rooms, offices, and shops where you need rapid comfort on cold days. Adjustable heat settings and a thermostat dial allow you to control the temperature, while a cool-air fan-only mode provides ventilation in warmer weather. Safety features include overheat cutoff and tip-over protection. Lightweight and portable, it can be moved wherever warmth is needed.

title: Single Pole s/p DC MCB 250
shortDescription: Single-pole 250V DC MCB for protecting individual DC circuits in solar and battery systems.
description: The Single-Pole 250V DC MCB provides overcurrent and short-circuit protection for individual DC conductors in solar PV and battery installations. A single-pole design protects one conductor (typically the positive line), and is used where the negative is bonded to earth or where separate poles protect each conductor independently. The 250V DC rating is suitable for 12V, 24V, and 48V battery systems. Available in multiple current ratings to precisely size protection for your circuit. DIN-rail mountable and compact, it integrates easily into combiner boxes, charge controller enclosures, and DC distribution boards.

title: Single mcb breaker
shortDescription: Single-pole AC miniature circuit breaker for individual circuit protection in distribution boards.
description: The Single MCB Breaker is the most common circuit protection device found in residential and commercial distribution boards. It protects a single circuit — such as a lighting ring, socket ring, or dedicated appliance feed — by automatically tripping when it detects overcurrent or a short-circuit fault. Available in multiple current ratings (6A, 10A, 16A, 20A, 32A, etc.) to match different circuit requirements, it mounts on a standard DIN rail and takes up just one module width in the board. The toggle handle provides clear on/off indication and allows manual isolation when maintenance is needed. An essential building block of every electrical distribution system.

title: Smart Curtain Motors
shortDescription: Smart motorised curtain track system with remote control and app integration for automated curtains.
description: Smart Curtain Motors transform your existing curtains into an automated, app-controlled system. The quiet electric motor attaches to a compatible curtain track and opens or closes your curtains at the touch of a button on a remote control, smartphone app, or voice command through smart home assistants. Set schedules to open curtains at sunrise and close them at sunset, or integrate with other smart home devices for scene-based automation. The motor operates quietly enough for bedrooms and living rooms. Perfect for hard-to-reach windows, tall curtains, and anyone who wants the convenience and energy-saving benefits of automated window coverings.

title: Socket metallic switch
shortDescription: Metallic switch socket outlet available in single and double configurations for premium interiors.
description: The Socket Metallic Switch combines a switched power socket with a durable brushed metal faceplate for a premium look and feel. The metallic finish resists scratches, fingerprints, and daily wear, maintaining its appearance in high-traffic areas like kitchens, offices, and commercial spaces. Available in single and double socket configurations, each socket includes an individual on/off switch for convenient appliance control. The secure screw-terminal connections ensure safe, long-lasting wiring. Designed to fit standard patress boxes for straightforward installation or retrofit upgrades from plastic sockets.

title: Solar Camera 4g Wifi  Enabled
shortDescription: Solar-powered security camera with 4G SIM and WiFi connectivity for remote surveillance anywhere.
description: The Solar Camera with 4G and WiFi is a completely wireless security camera powered by its own solar panel, making it ideal for locations with no electricity or internet connection — such as farms, construction sites, remote warehouses, and rural properties. The built-in 4G SIM card slot provides cellular data connectivity for live video streaming and alerts to your smartphone, while WiFi capability allows local network connection where available. Motion detection triggers instant push notifications and video recording to a cloud platform or onboard SD card. Night vision, two-way audio, and weatherproof construction ensure round-the-clock surveillance in all conditions. Truly install-anywhere security with zero running cables.

title: Solar Ceiling Fun
shortDescription: DC-powered solar ceiling fan for off-grid ventilation and cooling in homes and workshops.
description: The Solar Ceiling Fan runs directly on DC power from a solar panel and battery system, providing cooling and air circulation in off-grid homes, cabins, workshops, and rural buildings where mains electricity is unavailable or unreliable. The efficient DC brushless motor consumes significantly less power than conventional AC ceiling fans, making the most of your limited solar energy. Multiple speed settings let you adjust airflow to your comfort level. The standard ceiling mount and blade design provide familiar performance and aesthetics. Pair it with a small solar panel and 12V battery for a completely self-contained cooling system that works even during daytime power outages.

title: Solar Floodlight 60W / 100W / 200W /300W
shortDescription: Solar-powered LED floodlight available in 60W, 100W, 200W, and 300W for zero-electricity outdoor lighting.
description: This Solar Floodlight range offers powerful outdoor illumination with no electricity bills and no wiring. Each unit comes with a separate solar panel connected by a cable, a high-capacity lithium battery, and an LED floodlight head. The solar panel charges the battery during the day, and the light operates automatically at night using the stored energy. Choose from 60W for gates and doorways, 100W for driveways and small compounds, 200W for car parks and sports areas, or 300W for large commercial spaces and perimeter security. A remote control adjusts brightness and timing modes. Weatherproof IP65 construction ensures reliable outdoor performance through all seasons.

title: Starlink Adaptor
shortDescription: Power adaptor for Starlink satellite internet dish, enabling alternative power supply connections.
description: The Starlink Adaptor allows you to power your Starlink satellite internet dish from alternative power sources or through non-standard power configurations. Whether you need to connect to a solar power system, a generator, or a different voltage supply, this adaptor bridges the gap between your power source and the Starlink hardware requirements. It is particularly useful in off-grid installations where the standard Starlink power supply may not be suitable for the available power infrastructure. Compact and robust, it ensures your Starlink internet connection stays online regardless of your power setup.

title: Starlink Kit
shortDescription: Complete Starlink satellite internet kit with dish, router, cables, and mounting hardware.
description: The Starlink Kit is a complete satellite internet system that delivers high-speed, low-latency internet to virtually any location on earth — even remote rural areas with no fibre, cable, or reliable mobile data coverage. The kit includes the Starlink dish (Dishy), a WiFi router, power supply, and all necessary cables and mounting hardware for a self-install setup. Simply place the dish with a clear view of the sky, connect the cables, and you are online within minutes. Starlink uses a constellation of low-earth-orbit satellites to provide speeds suitable for video calls, streaming, working from home, and running a business. Ideal for farms, lodges, rural homes, and remote work sites.

title: TV Socket
shortDescription: Coaxial TV aerial socket outlet for connecting television sets to antenna or cable TV signals.
description: The TV Socket is a wall-mounted coaxial outlet that provides a neat, permanent connection point for your television aerial or cable TV signal. It replaces dangling aerial cables with a clean, professional wall plate that matches your other switches and sockets. The coaxial connector accepts standard TV aerial plugs, and the socket wires to the incoming aerial cable from your rooftop antenna, satellite dish, or cable TV provider. Suitable for residential and commercial installations wherever a TV viewing point is needed. Mounts on a standard patress box for surface or flush installation.

title: TV snakelight with USB port
shortDescription: Flexible LED snakelight with USB port for ambient TV backlighting and device charging.
description: The TV Snakelight with USB Port is a flexible LED light designed to sit behind or beside your television, providing soft ambient backlighting that reduces eye strain during evening viewing. The gooseneck design lets you direct the light exactly where needed, while the integrated USB port on the base doubles as a convenient charging point for phones, tablets, or other USB devices. Powered via a standard plug, it eliminates the need for a separate USB charger at your entertainment unit. Also useful as a reading light, desk lamp, or bedside light. The warm LED produces a gentle glow that enhances your viewing experience without adding glare to the screen.

title: Twin Socket
shortDescription: Double power socket outlet for connecting two appliances from a single wall point.
description: The Twin Socket provides two independent power outlets from a single wall-mounted faceplate, allowing you to plug in two appliances without using an extension lead or adaptor. Each socket accommodates a standard 3-pin plug. The robust construction and secure terminal connections ensure safe, reliable power delivery for everyday appliances such as TVs, lamps, chargers, and kitchen equipment. Designed to fit a standard double patress box, it installs neatly into new builds or replaces an existing double socket during renovations. A practical, space-efficient solution for any room that needs multiple power points.

title: Utility Knife
shortDescription: Retractable utility knife for stripping cables, cutting insulation, and general electrical work.
description: The Utility Knife is an essential hand tool for electricians, solar installers, and general tradespeople. The retractable blade mechanism provides safe storage when not in use and extends quickly for tasks like stripping cable sheathing, cutting insulation tape, trimming conduit grommet edges, scoring drywall for patress box cutouts, and opening packaging. The ergonomic handle with a non-slip grip ensures comfortable, controlled cuts even during prolonged use. Standard trapezoidal blades are inexpensive and widely available, and the quick-change mechanism allows blade replacement without tools. A compact, belt-clip-ready design keeps it within reach at all times on the job site.

title: WIDE PADDED WAIST SAFETY BELT
shortDescription: Wide padded safety belt for work positioning on poles, towers, and elevated structures.
description: The Wide Padded Waist Safety Belt is designed for linemen, electricians, and tower workers who spend extended periods working at height. The extra-wide belt distributes load across a larger area of the lower back and hips, significantly reducing fatigue and pressure points compared to narrow belts. Thick cushioned padding provides comfort during prolonged use. Reinforced stitching and a heavy-duty buckle ensure the belt holds securely under working loads. D-ring attachment points allow connection to a positioning lanyard for hands-free work on wooden, concrete, or metal poles. Meets safety standards for work positioning equipment. Essential PPE for anyone doing elevated electrical or telecom installations.

title: Water Heater Switch
shortDescription: Dedicated high-current switch for water heaters and geysers, available in various amp ratings.
description: The Water Heater Switch is a dedicated, high-current wall switch purpose-built for controlling electric water heaters (geysers), immersion heaters, and other high-draw appliances. Available in multiple amp ratings to match different heater sizes, it features a clearly visible on/off indicator so you always know when the heater is active — helping manage electricity consumption. The switch is designed with wider terminal connections and heavier contact plates than standard light switches, safely handling the sustained high current that water heaters draw. A neon indicator light provides at-a-glance confirmation. Mounts alongside other switches or on its own patress box near the geyser for convenient control.

title: Waterproof Twin Socket
shortDescription: IP-rated weatherproof double socket for outdoor and wet-area electrical installations.
description: The Waterproof Twin Socket provides two protected power outlets for outdoor, garage, workshop, and wet-area use. The spring-loaded cover flaps seal each socket when not in use, preventing rain, dust, and splashing water from reaching the electrical contacts. Suitable for gardens, patios, car washes, pool areas, and industrial yards where standard indoor sockets would be unsafe. The robust enclosure and gasket seals maintain weatherproof integrity even when mounted on exposed walls. Both sockets accept standard 3-pin plugs and provide the same reliable power delivery as indoor sockets, but with the added protection needed for harsh environments.

title: Waterproof power supply 12v 700w
shortDescription: 700W waterproof 12V DC power supply for outdoor LED signage, strip lights, and lighting installations.
description: The Waterproof 12V 700W Power Supply is a high-capacity LED driver enclosed in a sealed aluminium housing for outdoor and damp-location use. It converts mains AC power to a stable 12V DC output capable of delivering up to 700 watts, making it suitable for large LED strip light installations, illuminated signage, architectural lighting, and other demanding 12V loads. The waterproof enclosure protects the electronics from rain, humidity, and dust, allowing permanent outdoor mounting. Built-in thermal protection and overcurrent safeguards ensure reliable long-term operation. Multiple output terminals allow connection to several LED channels from a single power supply, simplifying wiring in large lighting projects.

title: astraunant starry sky projector
shortDescription: Astronaut-shaped starry sky projector lamp that fills rooms with a rotating galaxy light display.
description: The Astronaut Starry Sky Projector is a decorative LED light in the shape of a miniature astronaut that projects a moving galaxy of stars and nebula patterns onto your walls and ceiling. Rotate the astronaut's head and arms to aim the projection in any direction. Multiple colour modes and rotation speeds let you create the perfect ambiance for bedrooms, nurseries, home cinemas, or party spaces. The gentle, drifting starfield is calming for children at bedtime and a striking conversation piece for adults. Powered by USB, it connects to any phone charger, power bank, or laptop. Compact and lightweight, it works on a bedside table, shelf, or desk.

title: aviation red light
shortDescription: Red aviation obstruction light for marking tall structures and ensuring aircraft safety compliance.
description: The Aviation Red Light is a high-visibility obstruction light designed to be mounted on tall structures — communication towers, building rooftops, cranes, wind turbines, and high-rise construction sites — to alert aircraft of the obstruction. The steady or flashing red LED output meets aviation regulatory requirements for low-intensity obstruction lighting. Weatherproof construction withstands constant outdoor exposure at height, including wind, rain, UV radiation, and temperature extremes. Low power consumption and long LED life minimize maintenance visits to elevated, hard-to-access mounting locations. An essential safety compliance product for any structure that penetrates airspace boundaries.

title: aviation solar beam light
shortDescription: Solar-powered aviation beam light for marking towers and tall structures without mains electricity.
description: The Aviation Solar Beam Light is a self-powered obstruction light that uses a built-in solar panel and rechargeable battery to operate independently of the electrical grid. Designed for marking communication towers, tall buildings, wind masts, and other elevated structures, it produces a high-intensity beam visible to aircraft at the distances required by aviation regulations. The solar panel charges the battery during daylight, and the light activates automatically at dusk. This eliminates the need to run power cables to the top of the structure, dramatically reducing installation cost and complexity. Weatherproof and maintenance-free for extended periods, it is the practical choice for remote or off-grid tower installations.

title: battery fuse 100A
shortDescription: 100A battery fuse for protecting high-current battery connections in solar and inverter systems.
description: The 100A Battery Fuse provides critical overcurrent protection for the high-current cable run between your battery bank and inverter. In solar and backup power systems, the battery-to-inverter connection carries the highest current in the entire system, and a short circuit or fault on this cable without fuse protection can cause catastrophic damage, fire, or battery rupture. This 100A rated fuse blows cleanly and quickly if current exceeds safe levels, disconnecting the battery before damage occurs. The bolt-down terminal design ensures solid, low-resistance connections at high current. An essential safety component that should be installed as close to the battery positive terminal as possible.

title: cabinet alluminium profile
shortDescription: Aluminium LED profile designed for mounting inside or beneath cabinets for concealed accent lighting.
description: The Cabinet Aluminium Profile is a slim, anodised aluminium channel specifically designed for mounting LED strip lights inside cupboards, under kitchen cabinets, inside wardrobes, and along shelving units. The profile houses the LED strip and protects it from physical damage, while the included frosted diffuser cover eliminates the dotted appearance of individual LEDs, producing a smooth, even line of light. End caps give the installation a professional, finished look. Available in lengths that can be cut to size on site. The aluminium body also acts as a heatsink, drawing heat away from the LED strip and extending its lifespan. Ideal for kitchen under-cabinet task lighting and display cabinet accent lighting.

title: camalong 2T
shortDescription: 2-tonne come-along hand winch puller for tensioning cables and pulling loads during installations.
description: The Camalong 2T is a 2-tonne capacity hand-operated ratchet cable puller (come-along) used by electricians, riggers, and construction workers for tensioning overhead power lines, pulling heavy cables through conduit runs, lifting equipment into position, and securing loads. The ratchet mechanism provides controlled, incremental pulling force that one person can operate safely. A steel wire rope and forged hooks ensure reliable grip on cables, chain links, or anchor points. The compact design is easy to carry to elevated or confined work locations. A locking mechanism holds the load in position when you stop cranking. An indispensable rigging tool for line installation and heavy pulling tasks.

title: concrete  climbers
shortDescription: Concrete pole climbing spikes for linemen working on concrete electrical and telecom poles.
description: Concrete Climbers are strap-on climbing spikes (gaffs) designed specifically for ascending concrete utility poles. Unlike wooden pole climbers, these feature hardened steel spikes shaped and angled to grip the textured surface of concrete poles securely. Adjustable leather or nylon leg straps and ankle pads ensure a snug, comfortable fit for extended climbing sessions. Used by electrical linemen, telecom technicians, and CCTV installers who need to reach equipment mounted on concrete poles where bucket trucks cannot access. Proper technique and a positioning belt (sold separately) are required for safe use. Built tough for daily professional use in all weather conditions.

title: fixed disco laser lights
shortDescription: Fixed-mount disco laser light projector for parties, events, and entertainment venues.
description: The Fixed Disco Laser Light projects a dazzling display of coloured laser beams, patterns, and shapes across your dance floor, walls, and ceiling. Designed for permanent or semi-permanent mounting in entertainment venues, bars, clubs, home party rooms, and event spaces, it activates automatically with sound-responsive mode that syncs the patterns to music beats, or runs in continuous auto-rotation mode. Multiple laser colours and pattern combinations create an immersive light show without the complexity or cost of a full stage lighting rig. Compact enough to mount on a wall bracket, ceiling hook, or tripod stand. Simply plug in, mount, and let the laser do the work at your next event.

title: full body safety harness
shortDescription: Full-body safety harness for fall arrest and work positioning at height.
description: The Full Body Safety Harness is an essential piece of personal protective equipment for anyone working at height — including solar panel installers on rooftops, electrical linemen on towers, construction workers on scaffolding, and maintenance technicians on elevated structures. The harness distributes fall-arrest forces across the thighs, pelvis, chest, and shoulders, minimising injury risk in the event of a fall. Adjustable leg straps, chest strap, and shoulder straps accommodate a range of body sizes. A dorsal D-ring provides the primary fall arrest attachment point, while front and side D-rings allow work positioning and restraint connections. Meets safety standards for fall protection equipment. Use with an appropriate lanyard and anchor point.

title: glass fuse
shortDescription: Glass cartridge fuse for protecting small electronics, instruments, and control circuits.
description: The Glass Fuse is a standard cartridge-type fuse with a transparent glass body that allows visual inspection of the fuse element. When the circuit draws excessive current, the thin wire element inside melts and breaks the circuit, protecting downstream equipment from damage. The clear glass body lets you see at a glance whether the fuse has blown — a blackened interior or broken wire confirms a fault. Used widely in inverters, charge controllers, control panels, amplifiers, power supplies, and other electronic equipment that requires precise overcurrent protection. Available in various current ratings and physical sizes to match your equipment's fuse holder and protection requirements.

title: industrial  motor siren 1km radius
shortDescription: Industrial electric motor siren with a 1km audible range for factory shift signals and emergency alerts.
description: The Industrial Motor Siren with 1km range is a powerful electromechanical warning device that produces a loud, distinctive wailing tone audible up to one kilometre away. Used in factories, mines, schools, warehouses, and rural communities as a shift-change signal, emergency alert, or general warning alarm. The electric motor spins an internal rotor to produce sound mechanically, resulting in a piercing tone that cuts through ambient noise. Operates on mains power and requires only a simple on/off switch or timer for activation. The durable all-metal construction withstands outdoor mounting and harsh industrial environments. Mount on a rooftop, pole, or high wall for maximum sound coverage.

title: industrial  motor siren 2km
shortDescription: Heavy-duty industrial motor siren with a 2km audible range for large facilities and wide-area alerts.
description: The Industrial Motor Siren with 2km range is the high-power version of the electromechanical warning siren, delivering an ear-piercing wail that carries up to two kilometres across open terrain. Designed for large industrial complexes, mining operations, military installations, and municipal emergency warning systems where a wider coverage area is essential. The larger motor and horn assembly generate significantly more acoustic output than the 1km model. Controlled by a simple contactor or timer circuit, it can be integrated into automated shift-management systems or emergency alert infrastructure. Robust steel construction and corrosion-resistant finish ensure years of reliable outdoor service.

title: integrated prepaid token meters
shortDescription: Integrated prepaid electricity meter with built-in display and token input for pay-as-you-go power management.
description: The Integrated Prepaid Token Meter is a single-unit electricity meter that combines metering, token input, and display into one compact device. Unlike split-type meters that have a separate keypad unit, the integrated model handles everything in board — tenants enter their purchased token directly on the meter's keypad, and the display shows remaining credit, current consumption, and tamper alerts. Ideal for landlords, property managers, and housing developments that need a simple, cost-effective prepaid billing solution without the complexity of running additional wiring to a separate customer interface unit. DIN-rail or panel mountable, it installs in the main distribution board and provides accurate, tamper-resistant energy measurement with automatic disconnection when credit runs out.

title: katiko manual changeover switch
shortDescription: Manual changeover switch for safely switching between mains power and a generator or alternative supply.
description: The Katiko Manual Changeover Switch allows you to safely switch your electrical load between two power sources — typically the utility mains supply and a backup generator or inverter. The rotary handle has three positions: Source 1, Off, and Source 2, with a clear mechanical interlock that prevents both sources from being connected simultaneously, eliminating the risk of backfeed that could damage equipment or endanger utility workers. Simply turn the handle to transfer your entire distribution board from one supply to the other. Suitable for residential, commercial, and light-industrial applications. Mounts inside or adjacent to the distribution board and wires directly to both incoming supplies and the load busbars.

title: led 12v dc tape striplight
shortDescription: 12V DC LED tape strip light for accent lighting, cove lighting, and decorative installations.
description: The 12V DC LED Tape Strip Light is a flexible, self-adhesive strip of surface-mount LEDs that can be applied to almost any clean, dry surface for accent, task, or decorative lighting. Peel off the backing and stick it under cabinets, inside shelving, along ceiling coves, behind TVs, around mirrors, or anywhere you want a clean line of light without visible fixtures. The flexible PCB bends around gentle curves and can be cut at marked intervals to fit any length. Runs on 12V DC from a compatible power supply or directly from a 12V solar battery system, making it popular for off-grid lighting as well as mains-powered interior design projects. Available in warm white, cool white, and RGB colour-changing variants.

title: led smd strip light
shortDescription: High-density SMD LED strip light for bright, continuous illumination in commercial and decorative use.
description: The LED SMD Strip Light features densely packed surface-mount diodes (SMDs) for a brighter, more continuous light output than standard LED tape. The higher LED count per metre reduces the visible gaps between light points, resulting in smoother illumination that is ideal for professional installations such as retail display lighting, hospitality accent lighting, architectural cove lighting, and signage backlighting. Self-adhesive backing simplifies installation on flat surfaces, while the flexible PCB substrate allows gentle bends. Cuttable at marked intervals for precision fitting. Powered by a 12V or 24V DC supply depending on the variant. Pair with an aluminium profile and diffuser for an even, shadow-free light line.

title: mc4 climping tool
shortDescription: Professional MC4 connector crimping tool for making reliable solar PV cable terminations.
description: The MC4 Crimping Tool is a purpose-built hand tool for crimping MC4 solar connectors onto PV cable. MC4 connectors are the industry-standard plug-and-socket system used to connect solar panels to each other and to the rest of the PV system. A proper crimp — made with the correct tool — creates a gas-tight, low-resistance connection that withstands decades of outdoor exposure, thermal cycling, and vibration. Using pliers or generic crimpers risks loose connections that cause voltage drop, overheating, and fire. This tool's calibrated die set produces a consistent, manufacturer-specified crimp every time. Ergonomic handles with ratchet action ensure full crimp completion. An essential tool for any solar installer.

title: motor siren radius 0.5km
shortDescription: Compact electric motor siren with 0.5km range for small premises and localised alert systems.
description: The Motor Siren with 0.5km range is a compact electromechanical warning device suitable for small factories, workshops, schools, farms, and residential compounds. It produces a loud wailing tone audible up to 500 metres, providing effective notification for shift changes, break times, security alerts, and emergency evacuations within a localised area. The smaller motor and horn assembly make it lighter and easier to mount than larger industrial sirens, while still delivering a piercing sound that cuts through normal background noise. Operates on mains power via a simple switch, timer, or alarm system trigger. Durable metal construction ensures reliable outdoor service.

title: motorized  ATS 63A
shortDescription: 63A motorised automatic transfer switch for seamless switchover between mains and backup power.
description: The Motorised ATS 63A is an automatic transfer switch that monitors your mains power supply and automatically switches your load to a backup source (generator, inverter, or second utility feed) when a power failure is detected. When mains power returns, it transfers back automatically after a stabilisation delay. The motorised mechanism provides reliable, repeatable switching action rated at 63 amps, suitable for homes, small offices, shops, and light commercial premises. Unlike manual changeover switches, the ATS requires no human intervention, ensuring uninterrupted power even when the premises are unattended. Includes adjustable voltage sensing thresholds and transfer delay timers. DIN-rail mountable for installation inside the distribution board.

title: on off project switch
shortDescription: Simple on/off toggle switch for DIY projects, control panels, and custom electrical assemblies.
description: The On/Off Project Switch is a straightforward toggle or rocker switch designed for use in custom control panels, DIY electronics projects, prototype assemblies, and equipment modifications. A clear on/off position provides positive confirmation of circuit state. The compact body mounts through a standard panel cutout with a nut or snap-in clip. Screw or solder terminals accept wire connections up to its rated current capacity. Suitable for switching lighting circuits, fans, pumps, solenoids, and other loads in custom-built equipment. Available in various current ratings to match your project's requirements. A simple, reliable switching solution for builders and makers.

title: original earthrod 14mm 4ff
shortDescription: 14mm x 4ft copper-bonded earth rod for establishing a reliable earthing connection.
description: The Original Earth Rod (14mm diameter, 4 feet long) is a copper-bonded steel grounding rod that is driven into the soil to establish a low-impedance earth connection for electrical installations. Earthing is a critical safety measure that provides a path for fault current to flow safely to ground, enabling protective devices like RCDs and MCBs to trip quickly and disconnect the supply before anyone is harmed. The copper bonding prevents corrosion in the soil, maintaining a reliable earth connection for decades. The 14mm diameter and 4-foot length provide sufficient soil contact for most residential and light commercial installations. Drive it into the ground using a hammer or SDS driver with an earth rod driving head, then connect your earth conductor using a clamp.

title: porcelain  holders
shortDescription: Porcelain lamp holders for heat-resistant bulb connections in industrial and basic lighting.
description: Porcelain Lamp Holders are heat-resistant ceramic bulb sockets used where high temperatures or demanding conditions make plastic holders unsuitable. Porcelain does not melt, warp, or discolour under prolonged heat exposure, making these holders ideal for use with incandescent bulbs, heat lamps, brooder lamps in poultry houses, kiln lighting, and industrial environments. The standard E27 (Edison screw) fitting accepts the most common bulb base size. Simple screw-terminal wiring makes installation straightforward. Surface-mount or pendant-mount configurations are available. Porcelain holders have been the trusted choice for decades in applications where durability and heat resistance matter more than aesthetics.

title: pv fuses and holders
shortDescription: PV-rated fuses and fuse holders for protecting solar panel string circuits.
description: PV Fuses and Holders are DC-rated fuse links and their corresponding fuse holders designed specifically for protecting solar photovoltaic string circuits. In a solar array with multiple parallel strings, a fuse on each string prevents reverse current from flowing through a faulted string, which could overheat the cables and cause fire. PV fuses are rated for the high DC voltages encountered in solar systems (up to 1000V or 1500V DC) and are designed to safely interrupt DC fault current, which is harder to break than AC due to the absence of a zero-crossing point. The fuse holders accept standard 10x38mm PV fuse links and mount inside string combiner boxes. Replace fuses without tools using the pull-out carrier.

title: pv solar disconect
shortDescription: DC isolator switch for safely disconnecting solar PV arrays during maintenance and emergencies.
description: The PV Solar Disconnect is a DC-rated isolator switch that provides a safe, visible means of disconnecting the solar panel array from the inverter, charge controller, or combiner box. Unlike AC switches, this isolator is specifically designed to break high-voltage DC circuits — which is significantly harder because DC arcs do not self-extinguish at zero crossings like AC arcs do. The enclosed rotary handle provides clear on/off indication and can be padlocked in the off position for lockout/tagout during maintenance. Required by electrical codes at multiple points in a PV system: between the array and inverter, and often at the roof penetration point. Weatherproof enclosure for outdoor installation near the solar panels.

title: pv solar fuse 32A,20A, 16A
shortDescription: DC-rated PV solar fuses available in 16A, 20A, and 32A for protecting solar string circuits.
description: PV Solar Fuses in 16A, 20A, and 32A ratings are high-voltage DC fuse links designed to protect individual string circuits in solar photovoltaic arrays. Each fuse is rated for DC voltages up to 1000V, ensuring safe interruption of fault current in solar systems. The 16A size suits strings with lower-current panels, the 20A is the most common for standard residential panels, and the 32A protects higher-current commercial panel strings. Standard 10x38mm cylindrical form factor fits industry-standard PV fuse holders in combiner boxes. These fuses act as the first line of defence against overcurrent caused by ground faults, short circuits, or reverse current flow in parallel string configurations. Always match the fuse rating to the panel string's maximum series fuse rating.

title: rotary  led strobe
shortDescription: Rotating LED strobe warning light for vehicles, machinery, gates, and security alert systems.
description: The Rotary LED Strobe is a high-visibility warning light that produces a bright, rotating flash pattern visible from all angles. Used on forklifts, construction vehicles, gate pillars, warehouse entrances, generator enclosures, and alarm systems to draw attention to hazards, moving equipment, or security events. The LED light source provides intense brightness with low power consumption and a lifespan far exceeding incandescent rotating beacons. Multiple flash patterns (rotating, strobe, steady) can typically be selected to suit the application. Available in amber, red, blue, green, and white. The compact dome housing with magnetic, bolt, or bracket mount options ensures quick installation on any surface.

title: safety marine aviation lights
shortDescription: Multi-purpose safety light for marine navigation and aviation obstruction marking.
description: Safety Marine Aviation Lights are high-visibility warning lights designed to serve dual roles: marking marine navigation hazards (buoys, docks, channel markers, jetties) and acting as aviation obstruction lights on coastal masts and towers. The weatherproof, corrosion-resistant housing withstands saltwater spray, humidity, and constant UV exposure in marine environments. The LED light source provides thousands of hours of maintenance-free operation, critical for remote or hard-to-access installations. Multiple flash modes meet various marine and aviation regulatory requirements. Solar-compatible models allow fully autonomous operation without mains power. An essential safety product for harbours, marinas, offshore platforms, and any tall structure near waterways.

title: sigle mc4 solar connectors
shortDescription: Individual MC4 male and female solar connectors for custom PV cable assemblies.
description: Single MC4 Solar Connectors are the industry-standard plug-and-socket connectors used throughout solar PV systems to create secure, weatherproof, and tool-free electrical connections between panels, extension cables, combiner boxes, and inverters. Each connector consists of a male or female contact pin, an insulating housing, and a cable gland that grips the PV cable and seals out moisture. The snap-lock mechanism ensures connectors stay firmly mated even in wind and vibration. IP67-rated for outdoor use, they resist UV degradation, rain, and temperature extremes. Sold individually so you can build custom cable lengths and configurations. Always crimp with a proper MC4 crimping tool for a reliable, low-resistance connection.

title: sigle patress, twin patress
shortDescription: Surface-mount patress boxes in single and twin sizes for mounting switches and sockets on walls.
description: Patress boxes (also called pattress or surface boxes) are the mounting enclosures that sit on the wall surface and house the wiring behind your switches and sockets. The single patress accommodates one-gang faceplates (single switches, single sockets), while the twin patress fits two-gang faceplates (double switches, twin sockets). Made from durable PVC, they provide a neat, enclosed space for cable terminations where flush (recessed) boxes are impractical — such as on solid concrete or brick walls, in outbuildings, and during surface-wiring installations. Pre-punched cable entry knockouts on all sides and the back allow flexible cable routing. Available in standard depths to suit most faceplates and wiring configurations.

title: solar powered aviation  lights
shortDescription: Solar-powered aviation obstruction lights for autonomous operation on remote towers and tall structures.
description: Solar Powered Aviation Lights are self-contained obstruction warning lights that use an integrated solar panel and rechargeable battery to operate without any external power source. They are purpose-built for marking the tops of communication towers, wind masts, tall buildings, cranes, and other structures that require aviation obstruction lighting in locations where running mains power is impractical or prohibitively expensive. The solar panel charges the battery during the day, and a light sensor activates the red or white LED beacon automatically at dusk. Designed for years of reliable, unattended operation, the sealed unit withstands extreme weather, UV exposure, and the vibrations encountered at the top of tall structures. Eliminates ongoing electricity costs and the need for power cable runs to elevation.

title: solar pv climping tool pliers
shortDescription: Multi-purpose solar PV tool combining wire stripping, cable cutting, and MC4 crimping in one plier.
description: The Solar PV Crimping Tool Pliers is a multi-function hand tool that combines cable cutting, wire stripping, and MC4 connector crimping into a single instrument. Instead of carrying three separate tools on a solar installation job, this all-in-one plier handles the complete PV cable preparation and termination workflow: cut the cable to length, strip the insulation to expose the conductor, and crimp the MC4 connector pin — all with one tool. The calibrated crimp die ensures consistent, reliable connections that meet connector specifications. Comfortable, insulated handles provide a secure grip. Compact enough to fit in a tool belt or pouch. A time-saving, space-saving essential for solar installers and maintenance technicians.

title: spot welding machine
shortDescription: Spot welding machine for joining nickel strips to battery cells in battery pack assembly.
description: The Spot Welding Machine is designed for building custom lithium-ion and nickel-metal-hydride battery packs by welding thin nickel connecting strips to battery cell terminals. Spot welding is the preferred method for joining nickel tabs to cells because it delivers a fast, concentrated pulse of current that creates a strong weld without heating the battery cell enough to damage it — unlike soldering, which can overheat and degrade cell chemistry. Adjustable pulse energy settings let you dial in the perfect weld for different strip thicknesses and cell sizes. Used by battery pack builders for e-bikes, solar storage banks, power walls, portable power stations, and custom battery projects. Available in different power capacities to suit hobbyist or professional production volumes.

title: stringed 2by1 mc4
shortDescription: 2-to-1 MC4 Y-branch connector for combining two solar panel strings into one cable.
description: The Stringed 2-to-1 MC4 connector (Y-branch) combines the output of two parallel solar panel strings into a single cable, reducing the number of connections at the inverter or combiner box. Instead of running two separate cables from two strings, the Y-branch merges them into one, simplifying cable management on the roof and in the cable tray. The connector maintains the weatherproof, snap-lock MC4 standard with IP67 protection. UV-resistant housing and PPO insulation ensure long-term outdoor reliability. Available in both positive and negative configurations to match your array wiring. Essential for systems with multiple parallel strings where you want to minimise cable runs and connection points. Always ensure the combined string current does not exceed the cable and connector rating.

title: svc 10kva ac stabilizer
shortDescription: 10KVA automatic voltage stabilizer for protecting equipment from voltage fluctuations and surges.
description: The SVC 10KVA AC Stabilizer is an automatic voltage regulator that continuously monitors the incoming mains voltage and corrects it to a stable output, protecting your connected equipment from the damaging effects of voltage fluctuations, surges, sags, and brownouts. With a 10KVA capacity, it can stabilize the supply for an entire home, office, or workshop — covering refrigerators, computers, air conditioners, televisions, and other sensitive electronics simultaneously. The servo-motor-driven mechanism provides smooth, stepless voltage correction with fast response time. A digital display shows input voltage, output voltage, and load status in real time. Over-voltage and under-voltage protection trips automatically if conditions exceed correctable range. Essential in areas with unreliable or fluctuating grid supply.

title: wall lamp
shortDescription: Decorative wall-mounted lamp for ambient and accent lighting in homes, hotels, and offices.
description: The Wall Lamp is a decorative light fixture that mounts directly to the wall surface, providing ambient, accent, or task lighting without taking up floor or table space. The upward and/or downward light wash creates a warm, inviting atmosphere in hallways, living rooms, bedrooms, staircases, hotel corridors, and restaurant dining areas. The contemporary design complements modern and transitional interiors. Standard E27 or E14 bulb fitting (depending on model) accepts LED bulbs for energy-efficient operation. Wires to a wall-mounted junction box, and can be controlled by a wall switch or smart dimmer for adjustable brightness. A simple way to add layers of light to your interior design scheme.

title: wooden Pole Climber 10"
shortDescription: 10-inch wooden pole climbing spikes for linemen working on treated wooden utility poles.
description: The Wooden Pole Climber (10 inch) is a pair of strap-on climbing gaffs with 10-inch steel spikes designed specifically for ascending wooden utility poles. The longer spike length penetrates through the outer layer of treated timber to grip the solid wood beneath, providing a secure foothold for linemen, electricians, and telecom technicians working on overhead wooden power and communication poles. Adjustable leg irons and padded leather or nylon straps secure the climber comfortably to the lower leg and ankle. The hardened steel gaff points maintain sharpness through repeated use and can be resharpened when needed. Always use with a positioning belt or full-body harness for safe working at height. Built for daily professional use in all weather conditions.
